tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides functions to run FastQC and aggregate the reports, facilitating quality control of sequencing data within R workflows.

tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB pipeline for processing Electroencephalography (EEG) data using Independent Component Analysis (ICA) for artifact removal and source localization.

tools.name: pfasta

tools.detailed_description: A strict and efficient FASTA parser written in C, designed to handle sequence data with high correctness and performance.

tools.name: FastQt

tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface (GUI) implementation of the FastQC tool using Qt5, allowing users to perform quality control on sequencing data interactively.

tools.name: FastqCleaner

tools.detailed_description: An interactive R Shiny application that provides a user-friendly interface for processing, filtering, and trimming FASTQ sequencing files.

tools.name: klib.nim

tools.detailed_description: A Nim language port/implementation of the klib library, providing efficient parsing for FASTA/FASTQ files and interval query functionalities for bioinformatics.

tools.name: pre-pe

tools.name: fastx-toolkit

tools.name: QClus

tools.name: MerKurio

tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based tool for efficient extraction and filtering of FASTA/FASTQ and SAM/BAM records using k-mer based matching and tagging.

tools.name: Cutadapt
tools.one_line_profile: Removes adapter sequences from sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: A widely used tool for finding and removing adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and other unwanted sequence from high-throughput sequencing reads.

tools.name: seq_io

tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Rust library for parsing FASTA and FASTQ file formats, designed for speed and low memory usage in bioinformatics applications.

tools.name: ontime

tools.name: slide_snake

tools.name: WES Pipeline

tools.name: ArtificialFastqGenerator

tools.name: MiTools

tools.name: rnaSeqFPro

tools.name: NGS QC Toolkit

tools.name: Ancient_mtDNA_Pipeline

tools.name: kseq-rs

tools.name: nf-skyline-dia-ms

tools.name: alview
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and portable alignment viewer for BAM files
tools.detailed_description: A fast, portable tool for viewing short reads from BAM files, capable of running as a native GUI program, command line tool, or via a web server.

tools.name: pisces
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq library quantitation and QC pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for rapid transcript quantitation, genetic fingerprinting, and quality control assessment of RNAseq libraries, leveraging Salmon for quantification.

tools.name: FMSI
tools.one_line_profile: Memory efficient exact k-mer set index
tools.detailed_description: A highly memory efficient exact k-mer set index implementation based on masked superstrings and the masked Burrows-Wheeler transform.

tools.name: G-BLASTN
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated nucleotide alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated nucleotide alignment tool based on the widely used NCBI-BLAST, designed to speed up sequence alignment tasks.

tools.name: pbmm2
tools.one_line_profile: Minimap2 frontend for PacBio native data formats
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around minimap2 specifically designed for PacBio native data formats, facilitating the alignment of long reads.

tools.name: Arioc
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated DNA short-read alignment
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance DNA short-read alignment tool that leverages GPU acceleration for speed.

tools.name: astar-pairwise-aligner
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise sequence aligner using A* algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A pairwise sequence alignment tool written in Rust, implementing the A* algorithm for optimal alignment.

tools.name: manymap
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated long read alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accelerating long read alignment, optimized for performance across different processor architectures.

tools.name: phylommand
tools.one_line_profile: Package for phylogenetic tree and alignment manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A software package to create, manipulate, and analyze phylogenetic trees or pairwise alignments.

tools.name: SALMON
tools.one_line_profile: First-principles electron dynamics calculations
tools.detailed_description: A scientific program for performing first-principles electron dynamics calculations based on Time-Dependent Density Functional Theory (TDDFT).

tools.name: SALMON2
tools.one_line_profile: Development repository for SALMON 2.0.0
tools.detailed_description: The development repository for version 2.0.0 of the SALMON software for electron dynamics calculations.

tools.name: MUMandCo
tools.one_line_profile: Structural Variation detection using MUMmer alignment
tools.detailed_description: A bash script that utilizes Whole Genome Alignment information provided by MUMmer (v4) to detect Structural Variations.

tools.name: FMHE
tools.one_line_profile: Genome analysis with Homomorphic Encryption
tools.detailed_description: A tool for compressed/searchable indexing and genome analysis performed on data encrypted with Homomorphic Encryption.

tools.name: f5n
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore sequencing analysis toolkit for Android
tools.detailed_description: Also known as Genopo, this is a mobile toolkit for performing nanopore sequencing data analysis directly on Android smartphones.

tools.name: scRNA_pre_process
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing scRNA-seq data using kallisto and bustools
tools.detailed_description: A workflow script/pipeline designed to pre-process single-cell RNA sequencing data, leveraging the kallisto and bustools tools for pseudoalignment and quantification.

tools.name: Aeron
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment, quantification, and fusion prediction from long RNA reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by SchulzLab for processing long-read RNA sequencing data, providing functionality for read alignment, transcript quantification, and the prediction of fusion genes.

tools.name: rnabridge-align
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient tool to bridge paired-end RNA-seq reads
tools.detailed_description: A specialized alignment tool from the Shao Group designed to bridge paired-end RNA-seq reads, likely to improve assembly or mapping continuity.

tools.name: FastQ-Screen
tools.one_line_profile: Contamination detection and multi-species mapping for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows researchers to screen a library of sequences in FastQ format against a set of sequence databases so they can see if the composition of the library matches with what they expect.

tools.name: Genotype_Imputation_Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing and imputing genotype data from TOPMED/dbGaP
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for processing genotype datasets, including steps for reference genome build identification, mapping (liftOver), quality control, ancestry analysis, phasing, and imputation.

tools.name: CTAT-LR-fusion
tools.one_line_profile: Fusion transcript detection using long reads
tools.detailed_description: Part of the TrinityCTAT ecosystem, this tool leverages minimap2 and FusionInspector to detect fusion transcripts specifically from long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: minimap2-acceleration
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware acceleration for minimap2 long-read alignment
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation for hardware acceleration of the pairwise overlapping step in genome sequencing, specifically targeting the minimap2 algorithm.

tools.name: stepRNA
tools.one_line_profile: Align short RNA reads to determine overhang length
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to align short RNA sequencing reads to reference sequences to calculate and analyze the length of overhangs, useful in small RNA studies.

tools.name: AgrVATE
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of Staphylococcus aureus agr locus type and variants
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the rapid identification of Staphylococcus aureus agr locus types and agr operon variants from sequencing data.

tools.name: MultiMap
tools.one_line_profile: R package for mapping cells to reference with batch correction
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for mapping single cells to a reference dataset, specifically handling cases that contain batch effects.

tools.name: alaska
tools.one_line_profile: Automated RNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline for RNA-seq analysis developed by the WormLab at Caltech, designed to simplify the processing of RNA sequencing data (Note: Deprecated).

tools.name: CLAM
tools.one_line_profile: CLIP-seq Analysis of Multi-mapped reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing CLIP-seq data, specifically focusing on handling and rescuing multi-mapped reads to improve data recovery and analysis accuracy.

tools.name: NanoCount
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript abundance estimation from nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating transcript abundance from nanopore long reads that have been mapped to a transcriptome using minimap2, employing an Expectation-Maximization (EM) algorithm.

tools.name: variant-calling-at-scale
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable variant calling on cluster environments
tools.detailed_description: A framework or set of tools designed to perform high-performance, scalable variant calling on cluster computing environments.

tools.name: CNVnator
tools.one_line_profile: CNV discovery and genotyping from depth-of-coverage
tools.detailed_description: A widely used tool for Copy Number Variation (CNV) discovery and genotyping using read depth (RD) analysis of mapped reads.

tools.name: CNVpytor
tools.one_line_profile: Python extension of CNVnator for CNV analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based extension and improvement of CNVnator, offering functionality for CNV analysis and visualization from depth-of-coverage data.

tools.name: GRIPper
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of non-reference processed pseudogene insertions
tools.detailed_description: A tool to identify non-reference processed pseudogene insertions by analyzing discordant read pair mappings in sequencing data.

tools.name: fast-sg
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast scaffolding graph construction from reads
tools.detailed_description: An alignment-free algorithm designed for the rapid construction of scaffolding graphs from short or long sequencing reads, aiding in genome assembly.

tools.name: paired
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for pairwise sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing functionality for the pairwise alignment of arbitrary sequences, suitable for basic sequence comparison tasks.

tools.name: cstag
tools.one_line_profile: Python module to manipulate and visualize minimap2's cs tag
tools.detailed_description: A Python module designed to parse, manipulate, and visualize the 'cs' (compact cigar) tag generated by minimap2, facilitating detailed alignment analysis.

tools.name: LOGAN
tools.one_line_profile: High-Performance Multi-GPU X-Drop Long-Read Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance alignment tool that leverages multiple GPUs to accelerate X-Drop long-read alignment, optimizing processing speed for large datasets.

tools.name: pairwise-alignment-in-python
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Needleman-Wunsch and Smith-Waterman algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of standard pairwise string alignment algorithms (Needleman-Wunsch for global and Smith-Waterman for local alignment), useful for educational purposes or lightweight alignment tasks.

tools.name: SpliceWiz
tools.one_line_profile: R package for differential alternative splicing analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for analyzing differential alternative splicing events using splice-aware alignment BAM files, providing tools for quantification and visualization.

tools.name: STAR
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast universal RNA-seq aligner
tools.detailed_description: Spliced Transcripts Alignment to a Reference (STAR) is a widely used, high-performance RNA-seq aligner known for its speed and accuracy in mapping reads to a reference genome.

tools.name: SBWT
tools.one_line_profile: Succinct k-mer set representation using Spectral Burrows-Wheeler Transform
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of the Spectral Burrows-Wheeler Transform (SBWT) for creating succinct representations of k-mer sets. It supports subset rank queries and is designed for efficient storage and querying of high-throughput sequencing data.

tools.name: pseqsid
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise sequence identity and similarity calculator for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A tool written in Rust to calculate pairwise sequence identity, similarity, and normalized similarity scores for proteins within a multiple sequence alignment (MSA).

tools.name: SNAP
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Nucleotide Alignment Program for high-throughput sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate read aligner designed for high-throughput sequencing data. It is optimized for speed and scalability, handling large datasets of nucleotide reads.

tools.name: biostructmap
tools.one_line_profile: Maps sequence-aligned data onto protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that facilitates the mapping of data derived from sequence alignments (such as evolutionary rates or population genetics metrics) onto 3D protein structures for structural analysis.

tools.name: parasailors
tools.one_line_profile: Rust bindings for the Parasail SIMD alignment library
tools.detailed_description: Provides Rust bindings to the Parasail library, enabling high-performance, SIMD-accelerated pairwise sequence alignment (Smith-Waterman, Needleman-Wunsch, etc.) within Rust applications.

tools.name: genomics-data-index
tools.one_line_profile: Genome indexing system using SNVs and kmers
tools.detailed_description: A tool for indexing genomes based on SNVs, MLST profiles, or kmers to enable rapid querying, clustering, and visualization of large genomic datasets.

tools.name: SOAP3-dp
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated short-read aligner
tools.detailed_description: A short-read aligner that leverages both CPU and GPU computational power to deliver high speed and sensitivity. It is part of the SOAP (Short Oligonucleotide Analysis Package) suite.

tools.name: aligner-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable sequence alignment for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: Implements sequence alignment algorithms (like soft-DTW or differentiable Needleman-Wunsch) as PyTorch modules, enabling their use in deep learning models for sequence analysis.

tools.name: PAGAN2
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogeny-aware multiple sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the PAGAN multiple sequence alignment tool, designed to place sequences into an existing alignment and phylogenetic tree, or to construct new alignments using phylogenetic information.

tools.name: EMA
tools.one_line_profile: Aligner for barcoded short-reads (Linked-Reads)
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate alignment tool specifically designed for barcoded short-reads (such as 10x Genomics Linked-Reads), utilizing barcode information to resolve mapping ambiguities.

tools.name: minichain
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read aligner to pangenome graphs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for aligning long reads to pangenome graphs. It chains seeds on a graph to perform accurate mapping in the presence of structural variations.

tools.name: mm2-plus
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated version of minimap2 for long-read mapping
tools.detailed_description: A performance-optimized fork or variant of the minimap2 aligner, designed for fast long-read mapping and whole-genome alignment.

tools.name: superSTR
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free detector for repeat-containing reads
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, alignment-free utility designed to detect reads containing short tandem repeats (STRs) in short-read WGS, WES, and RNA-seq data.

tools.name: 2passtools
tools.one_line_profile: Two-pass alignment utility for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A toolset to perform two-pass alignment for long reads, likely to improve alignment accuracy around difficult regions or splice sites.

tools.name: DIAMOND
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance protein sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: A sequence aligner for protein and translated DNA searches, designed to be a drop-in replacement for BLASTX and BLASTP but significantly faster, suitable for large-scale metagenomics analysis.

tools.name: TMBur
tools.one_line_profile: Tumor Mutational Burden estimation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline that runs alignment and variant calling on whole genome FASTQ files to report Tumor Mutational Burden (TMB) estimates.

tools.name: straglr
tools.one_line_profile: Tandem repeat expansion detection from long-read alignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting and genotyping tandem repeat expansions using long-read sequencing alignments (PacBio/Nanopore).

tools.name: cPecan
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise multiple sequence alignment library
tools.detailed_description: A standalone C and Python implementation of the pairwise multiple sequence alignment functionality originally developed for the Cactus alignment program.

tools.name: KneadData
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control for metagenomic sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to perform quality control on metagenomic and metatranscriptomic sequencing data, specifically separating host reads from microbiome reads.

tools.name: IDP
tools.one_line_profile: Isoform Detection and Prediction using hybrid sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A statistical method for isoform prediction that constructs candidate isoforms by combining long reads and short reads with spliced alignment.

tools.name: browniealigner
tools.one_line_profile: Short read aligner to de Bruijn graphs
tools.detailed_description: An alignment algorithm specifically designed for mapping short Illumina reads to a de Bruijn graph structure.

tools.name: biowasm
tools.one_line_profile: WebAssembly modules for genomics tools
tools.detailed_description: A project that compiles popular C/C++ genomics tools (like seqtk, samtools) into WebAssembly, enabling them to run directly in web browsers for client-side analysis.

tools.name: epitopefindr
tools.one_line_profile: Peptide sequence alignment and epitope identification
tools.detailed_description: An R package that uses BLAST to align peptide sequences against each other to identify minimal overlapping regions, useful for epitope mapping.

tools.name: bwa-meth
tools.one_line_profile: Fast BS-Seq aligner using bwa-mem
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate aligner for Bisulfite-Sequencing (BS-Seq) reads. It wraps bwa-mem and handles the 3-letter genome conversion required for methylation analysis.

tools.name: fastq-join
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for joining paired-end reads
tools.detailed_description: A utility (part of ea-utils) that joins paired-end FASTQ reads based on squared distance anchored alignment, often used in preprocessing for amplicon sequencing.

tools.name: bwa-mem2
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized version of the BWA-MEM aligner
tools.detailed_description: The next iteration of the popular bwa-mem aligner, optimized for performance using SIMD instructions to speed up alignment of DNA sequences.

tools.name: WITCH
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple sequence alignment method using weighted HMMs
tools.detailed_description: WITCH is a multiple sequence alignment method that uses multiple weighted Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) to align unaligned sequences and find consensuses.

tools.name: PCAP-core
tools.one_line_profile: NGS mapping reference implementations for PanCancer
tools.detailed_description: NGS reference implementations and helper code for mapping, originally developed as part of the ICGC-TCGA-PanCancer project.

tools.name: psi
tools.one_line_profile: Pan-genome Seed Index for sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A Pan-genome Seed Index implementation designed to support efficient indexing and querying in pan-genomic analysis.

tools.name: kallisto-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Kallisto & Sleuth RNA-Seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow implementation of the Kallisto and Sleuth tools for RNA-Seq quantification and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: annotate_my_genomes
tools.one_line_profile: Genome annotation pipeline using sequencing alignments
tools.detailed_description: A genome annotation pipeline that utilizes short and long sequencing read alignments to annotate animal genomes.

tools.name: hs-blastn
tools.one_line_profile: Fast nucleotide-nucleotide sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: hs-blastn is a fast and accurate nucleotide-nucleotide sequence aligner designed for high-throughput sequence analysis.

tools.name: BitMapperBS
tools.one_line_profile: Fast aligner for whole-genome bisulfite sequencing
tools.detailed_description: BitMapperBS is a fast and accurate read aligner specifically designed for whole-genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) data.

tools.name: cljam
tools.one_line_profile: SAM/BAM library for Clojure
tools.detailed_description: A DNA Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) and Binary Alignment/Map (BAM) library for the Clojure programming language, enabling manipulation of alignment data.

tools.name: kallisto-align
tools.one_line_profile: Export kallisto pseudo-alignments to sparse matrix
tools.detailed_description: A utility to export kallisto pseudo-alignments into a sparse binary matrix format for downstream analysis.

tools.name: BigBWA
tools.one_line_profile: Hadoop-based BWA accelerator
tools.detailed_description: BigBWA uses the Big Data technology Hadoop to boost the performance of the Burrows–Wheeler aligner (BWA) for large-scale sequence alignment.

tools.name: SparkBWA
tools.one_line_profile: Spark-based BWA accelerator
tools.detailed_description: SparkBWA exploits Apache Spark to boost the performance of the Burrows-Wheeler Aligner (BWA) for distributed sequence alignment.

tools.name: Peregrine
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Genome Assembler Using SHIMMER Index
tools.detailed_description: Peregrine is a fast genome assembler that utilizes the SHIMMER index structure for efficient assembly of sequencing data.

tools.name: PoGo
tools.one_line_profile: Proteogenomic mapping tool for peptides
tools.detailed_description: PoGo is a proteogenomic tool that allows mapping of peptides identified through mass spectrometry to a reference genome using gene annotations.

tools.name: MetaSBT
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable framework for indexing microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: MetaSBT is a scalable framework for automatically indexing microbial genomes and accurately characterizing metagenome-assembled genomes using Sequence Bloom Trees.

tools.name: genomics-pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Spark-parallelized genomics secondary analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A set of secondary analysis pipelines for genomics data, parallelized using Apache Spark to improve performance and scalability.

tools.name: rHAT
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio sequence alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: rHAT is a fast and accurate sequence alignment tool designed specifically for PacBio long reads.

tools.name: DCC
tools.one_line_profile: CircRNA detection from STAR chimeric reads
tools.detailed_description: DCC detects back-splice junctions in next-generation sequencing data using output from the STAR read mapper to identify circular RNAs.

tools.name: genozip
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance genomic file compressor
tools.detailed_description: Genozip is a modern compressor for genomic files (FASTQ, SAM/BAM/CRAM, VCF, etc.) offering high compression ratios and speed.

tools.name: PacRAT
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read barcode-variant mapping tool
tools.detailed_description: PacRAT improves long-read barcode-variant mapping using multiple sequence alignment techniques.

tools.name: MASA-CUDAlign
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated DNA sequence aligner using Smith-Waterman/Needleman-Wunsch algorithms
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the MASA architecture that utilizes NVIDIA CUDA GPUs to accelerate pairwise alignment of unrestricted size DNA sequences using Smith-Waterman and Needleman-Wunsch algorithms combined with Myers-Miller.

tools.name: MASA-Core
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Platform Architecture framework for developing sequence alignment applications
tools.detailed_description: A flexible software framework (Multi-Platform Architecture for Sequence Aligner) designed to simplify the creation of DNA sequence alignment applications across multiple hardware/software platforms, supporting huge DNA sequences.

tools.name: pafcheck
tools.one_line_profile: Validator for Pairwise Alignment Format (PAF) files
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to validate PAF (Pairwise Alignment Format) files, specifically checking extended CIGAR strings and format consistency.

tools.name: wflign
tools.one_line_profile: WFA-guided ultralong tiling sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: A sequence aligner designed for ultralong sequences, using the Wavefront Alignment (WFA) algorithm to guide tiling alignment.

tools.name: mapquik
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient minimizer-space mapper for low-divergence long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping long reads with low divergence efficiently by operating in minimizer space, suitable for rapid mapping tasks.

tools.name: genome_tracks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for visualizing genome browser tracks from aligned BAM files
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module that facilitates the creation and visualization of genome browser tracks (e.g., for RNA-seq, ATAC-seq) from aligned BAM files, leveraging pyGenomeTracks and IGV-reports.

tools.name: vircov
tools.one_line_profile: Viral genome coverage evaluation tool for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to evaluate viral genome coverage in metagenomic diagnostic contexts, aiding in the identification and analysis of viral pathogens.

tools.name: AStarix
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and optimal sequence-to-graph aligner
tools.detailed_description: A sequence-to-graph aligner that uses the A* algorithm to find optimal alignments of sequences to reference graphs.

tools.name: edlibR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for the edlib sequence alignment library
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing bindings to edlib, a fast C/C++ library for pairwise sequence alignment using edit distance (Levenshtein distance).

tools.name: PanPA
tools.one_line_profile: Panproteome graph construction and sequence alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for constructing panproteome graphs and aligning sequences back to these graphs, facilitating pangenomic analysis at the protein level.

tools.name: bwt-lcp-in-place
tools.one_line_profile: Constant space construction of BWT and LCP arrays
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of algorithms for constructing Burrows-Wheeler Transform (BWT) and Longest Common Prefix (LCP) arrays in constant space, useful for indexing in bioinformatics.

tools.name: CSA
tools.one_line_profile: Cyclic DNA Sequence Aligner
tools.detailed_description: A tool for aligning cyclic DNA sequences, addressing the specific challenge of circular genomes or plasmids.

tools.name: slaMEM
tools.one_line_profile: Maximal Exact Matches (MEMs) finder using Sampled LCP Array
tools.detailed_description: A tool/library for finding Maximal Exact Matches (MEMs) in sequences using a Sampled LCP Array, a core operation in many sequence alignment algorithms.

tools.name: QuasR
tools.one_line_profile: R framework for quantification and analysis of short reads
tools.detailed_description: An R/Bioconductor package providing a comprehensive workflow for analyzing short reads, including alignment (wrapping tools like Bowtie/SpliceMap), quality control, and quantification.

tools.name: pairdist
tools.one_line_profile: Neighbor-joining tree construction from pairwise alignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool that creates neighbor-joining trees from a set of sequences by calculating maximum likelihood distances based on pairwise sequence alignments.

tools.name: stampa
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence Taxonomic Assignment by Massive Pairwise Alignments
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for taxonomic assignment of sequences using massive pairwise alignments, suitable for metabarcoding or metagenomic studies.

tools.name: sge_mummer
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel execution wrapper for MUMmer on SGE clusters
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts to parallelize MUMmer alignment jobs by splitting the reference sequence and distributing tasks on a Sun Grid Engine (SGE) cluster.

tools.name: cblaster
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for finding clustered hits from BLAST searches
tools.detailed_description: A tool to identify and visualize clusters of co-located genomic hits from BLAST search results, useful for finding biosynthetic gene clusters.

tools.name: Cell_BLAST
tools.one_line_profile: BLAST-like toolkit for scRNA-seq data querying
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for large-scale single-cell RNA-seq data querying and annotation, using a BLAST-like search strategy to identify similar cells.

tools.name: chrom_mini_graph
tools.one_line_profile: Minimizer-based pangenome reference graph tool
tools.detailed_description: A space-efficient tool for constructing pangenome reference graphs and performing haplotype mapping using minimizers.

tools.name: MUMmer (HPC)
tools.one_line_profile: HPC-optimized version of MUMmer aligner
tools.detailed_description: A version of the MUMmer alignment system optimized for High Performance Computing (HPC) environments.

tools.name: GenomeTools
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive genome analysis system
tools.detailed_description: A versatile open-source collection of tools for genome analysis, including sequence processing, annotation handling, and visualization.

tools.name: XAVIER
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance X-Drop adaptive banded pairwise alignment
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance library/tool for pairwise sequence alignment using an X-Drop adaptive banded strategy, optimized for speed.

tools.name: mummer-ggplot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of MUMmer alignments using ggplot
tools.detailed_description: An R-based tool to generate customizable and high-quality plots of genome alignments produced by MUMmer (Nucmer), leveraging ggplot2.

tools.name: npInv
tools.one_line_profile: Inversion detection and genotyping using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurately detecting and genotyping genomic inversions using multiple alignment of long reads (e.g., Nanopore).

tools.name: RawMap
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient mapping for Read-Until pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to complement Minimap2 for fast and efficient mapping in Nanopore Read-Until (adaptive sampling) pipelines.

tools.name: fmlrc
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read error correction tool using the multi-string Burrows Wheeler Transform
tools.detailed_description: FMLRC is a tool for correcting long reads (e.g. Oxford Nanopore, PacBio) using high-accuracy short reads (e.g. Illumina). It utilizes an FM-index derived from the short reads to perform error correction.

tools.name: MapCaller
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient approach for short-read alignment and variant detection
tools.detailed_description: MapCaller is an integrated system for short-read alignment and variant calling. It combines read mapping and variant detection into a single efficient process, optimizing for high-throughput genomic data.

tools.name: SALMON (Survival Analysis)
tools.one_line_profile: Survival Analysis Learning with Multi-Omics Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: SALMON is a deep learning framework for survival analysis that integrates multi-omics data. It is designed to handle high-dimensional biological data for clinical outcome prediction.

tools.name: SalmonTE
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-Fast and Scalable Quantification Pipeline of Transpose Element Abundances
tools.detailed_description: SalmonTE is a pipeline for quantifying Transposable Elements (TEs) from RNA-seq data. It leverages the Salmon tool for fast quantification without requiring full genome alignment.

tools.name: Symphony
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient and precise single-cell reference atlas mapping
tools.detailed_description: Symphony is a tool for mapping single-cell query data onto reference atlases. It enables efficient transfer of annotations and embeddings from large-scale reference datasets to new query datasets.

tools.name: bwa-aln-xeon-phi
tools.one_line_profile: BWA alignment optimized for Intel Xeon Phi architecture
tools.detailed_description: An optimized version of the BWA aligner specifically designed for Intel Xeon Phi platforms, supporting symmetric running models on hybrid nodes.

tools.name: GraphMap
tools.one_line_profile: Highly sensitive and accurate mapper for long, error-prone reads
tools.detailed_description: GraphMap is a mapping algorithm designed for long-read sequencing data (e.g., Oxford Nanopore, PacBio). It is optimized for high error rates and provides sensitive alignment.

tools.name: AlignQC
tools.one_line_profile: Long read alignment analysis and quality control
tools.detailed_description: AlignQC generates reports on sequence alignments, analyzing mappability, error patterns, and annotations. It is specifically designed for long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: alignparse
tools.one_line_profile: Align sequences and parse features for deep mutational scanning
tools.detailed_description: Alignparse is a Python utility to align sequencing reads to a target sequence and parse specific features, commonly used in deep mutational scanning experiments.

tools.name: parasail
tools.one_line_profile: SIMD C library for global, semi-global, and local pairwise sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: Parasail is a high-performance C library for pairwise sequence alignment. It implements various alignment algorithms (Smith-Waterman, Needleman-Wunsch, etc.) using SIMD instructions for speed.

tools.name: minimap2-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust bindings to the minimap2 aligner library
tools.detailed_description: Provides Rust bindings for the minimap2 C library, enabling developers to use the minimap2 alignment and mapping algorithms within Rust applications.

tools.name: Kablammo
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web-based visualization tool for BLAST alignment results
tools.detailed_description: Kablammo is a web-based tool designed to help researchers visualize BLAST results. It allows users to upload XML results from BLAST runs and provides an interactive graphical representation of the alignments, facilitating the interpretation of sequence similarities.

tools.name: BWA-MEME
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated BWA-MEM2 aligner using learned-index structures
tools.detailed_description: BWA-MEME is a sequence alignment tool that improves upon the performance of BWA-MEM2 by incorporating learned-index data structures. It is designed to speed up the alignment of short reads to reference genomes while maintaining accuracy.

tools.name: MiniPhy
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic compression tool for large genome collections
tools.detailed_description: MiniPhy is a tool for the phylogenetic compression of extremely large genome collections. It enables efficient storage and analysis of massive genomic datasets by leveraging phylogenetic relationships to compress data.

tools.name: SVsearcher
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant detection from long read alignments
tools.detailed_description: SVsearcher is a computational method for detecting structural variants (SVs) from long read alignment data. It is developed by the Ken Sung lab and focuses on identifying genomic variations using long-read sequencing technologies.

tools.name: CryoREAD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for DNA/RNA structure modeling from cryo-EM maps
tools.detailed_description: CryoREAD is a computational tool that utilizes deep learning to automatically build full atomic structures of DNA and RNA from cryo-EM maps. It aids structural biologists in interpreting density maps and modeling nucleic acid structures.

tools.name: strobealign
tools.one_line_profile: Fast short-read aligner using strobemers
tools.detailed_description: strobealign is a fast and accurate aligner for short reads that uses strobemers as seeds. It is designed to offer a favorable trade-off between speed and accuracy for mapping high-throughput sequencing data.

tools.name: ultra
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate long-read splice alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: uLTRA is a tool for aligning long transcriptomic reads to a genome. It is designed to handle splice junctions with high accuracy, making it suitable for RNA-seq analysis using long-read technologies like PacBio and Nanopore.

tools.name: MetaLogo
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneity-aware sequence logo generator and aligner
tools.detailed_description: MetaLogo is a tool for generating sequence logos that can handle heterogeneity in sequence data. It includes alignment capabilities and is designed to visualize and analyze complex sequence motifs, such as those found in B-cell receptors or other diverse biological sequences.

tools.name: LASTZ
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise DNA sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: LASTZ is a pairwise aligner for DNA sequences, designed as a drop-in replacement for BLASTZ. It is widely used for whole-genome alignment and comparative genomics to identify orthologous regions between species.

tools.name: BWA
tools.one_line_profile: Burrows-Wheeler Aligner for short-read alignment
tools.detailed_description: BWA is a software package for mapping low-divergent sequences against a large reference genome, such as the human genome. It consists of three algorithms: BWA-backtrack, BWA-SW, and BWA-MEM, with BWA-MEM being the latest and generally recommended for high-quality queries.

tools.name: fermi
tools.one_line_profile: WGS de novo assembler based on FMD-index
tools.detailed_description: Fermi is a de novo assembler for whole-genome sequencing (WGS) data. It utilizes the FMD-index for handling large genomes and includes modules for error correction and graph manipulation.

tools.name: minimap
tools.one_line_profile: Predecessor to minimap2 for mapping DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: Minimap is a tool for mapping DNA sequences, serving as the predecessor to minimap2. While deprecated in favor of minimap2, it remains a reference implementation for mapping algorithms.

tools.name: minimap2
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile pairwise aligner for genomic and spliced sequences
tools.detailed_description: Minimap2 is a general-purpose alignment program for mapping DNA or long mRNA sequences against a large reference database. It is optimized for long reads (PacBio, Nanopore) and assembly-to-assembly alignment, but also supports short reads.

tools.name: unimap
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized aligner for assembly-to-reference alignment
tools.detailed_description: Unimap is an experimental fork of minimap2, specifically optimized for aligning genome assemblies to a reference genome. It is designed to handle the specific challenges of assembly mapping.

tools.name: jbwa
tools.one_line_profile: Java Native Interface (JNI) bindings for BWA
tools.detailed_description: jbwa provides Java bindings for the BWA aligner, allowing Java applications to directly utilize BWA's alignment algorithms via JNI. This enables the integration of BWA into Java-based bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: MHAP
tools.one_line_profile: MinHash Alignment Process for detecting long-read overlaps
tools.detailed_description: MHAP (MinHash Alignment Process) uses locality-sensitive hashing to efficiently detect overlaps between noisy long reads. It is primarily used in the assembly of long-read sequencing data (e.g., PacBio).

tools.name: MUMmer3
tools.one_line_profile: System for rapidly aligning entire genomes
tools.detailed_description: MUMmer3 is a versatile alignment package for comparing large scale DNA sequences. It can align whole genomes, incomplete genome assemblies, and other large sequence sets. It relies on suffix trees for efficient matching.

tools.name: MashMap
tools.one_line_profile: Fast approximate aligner for long DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A fast approximate aligner for long DNA sequences that computes local alignment boundaries using MinHash sketching.

tools.name: Winnowmap
tools.one_line_profile: Long read and genome alignment software
tools.detailed_description: A long-read aligner designed to handle repetitive reference sequences by using weighted minimizers.

tools.name: KAST
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free k-tuple frequency comparisons tool
tools.detailed_description: Performs alignment-free k-tuple frequency comparisons from sequences, supporting pairwise comparisons for reference and query files.

tools.name: Mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic sequence aligner implemented in Java
tools.detailed_description: A genomic sequence aligner designed for mapping reads to reference genomes.

tools.name: QuickEd
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance exact sequence alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance exact sequence alignment tool based on the bound-and-align paradigm.

tools.name: pafpy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for working with PAF (Pairwise mApping Format) files
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library for parsing and working with PAF (Pairwise mApping Format) files commonly used in long-read alignment.

tools.name: psdm
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise SNP distance matrix calculator
tools.detailed_description: A tool to compute a pairwise SNP distance matrix from one or two alignments, useful for genomic epidemiology.

tools.name: rasusa
tools.one_line_profile: Randomly subsample sequencing reads or alignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool to randomly subsample sequencing reads or alignments to a specified depth or coverage.

tools.name: streamformatics
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time species-typing visualisation for nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for real-time visualisation of species typing results from nanopore sequencing data.

tools.name: nanoranger
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified cellranger for long-read data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed as a simplified version of Cell Ranger specifically for processing long-read single-cell sequencing data.

tools.name: variant_calling_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for variant calling and annotation using BWA, GATK, and ENSEMBL, implemented with the Rubra/Ruffus framework.

tools.name: mummer2circos
tools.one_line_profile: Circular bacterial genome plots from alignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate circular bacterial genome plots (Circos) based on BLAST or NUCMER/PROMER alignments.

tools.name: HAlign-4
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid multiple sequence alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A strategy and tool for rapidly aligning millions of sequences (Multiple Sequence Alignment).

tools.name: IMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed long read aligner on Spark
tools.detailed_description: Improved Meta-aligner and Minimap2 On Spark, a distributed long read aligner designed for big data environments.

tools.name: rBLAST
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for BLAST
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface for the Basic Local Alignment Search Tool (BLAST).

tools.name: SMART
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-manual alignment to reference templates for whole brain mapping
tools.detailed_description: An open source pipeline in R for whole brain mapping and semi-manual alignment to reference templates.

tools.name: sam2pairwise
tools.one_line_profile: Reconstruct pairwise alignment from SAM files
tools.detailed_description: A tool that takes a SAM file and uses the CIGAR and MD tags to reconstruct and display the pairwise alignment of each read.

tools.name: CONSENT
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable long read self-correction and assembly polishing
tools.detailed_description: A tool for scalable long read self-correction and assembly polishing using multiple sequence alignment.

tools.name: HG-CoLoR
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid error correction for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid method based on a variable-order de Bruijn Graph for the error correction of long reads.

tools.name: TranscriptClean
tools.one_line_profile: Correct errors in mapped long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool to correct mismatches, microindels, and noncanonical splice junctions in long reads that have been mapped to the genome.

tools.name: MIA
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping Iterative Assembler for ancient DNA
tools.detailed_description: A consensus calling and reference-assisted assembly tool, chiefly designed for ancient mitochondrial DNA.

tools.name: kb-helper
tools.one_line_profile: Helper tool for scSeq alignment with kallisto
tools.detailed_description: A utility to streamline single-cell RNA-seq data alignment workflows using kallisto.

tools.name: multiz
tools.one_line_profile: DNA multiple sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: Official version of the DNA multiple sequence aligner from Penn State's Miller Lab, often used for whole-genome alignments.

tools.name: MUMmer
tools.one_line_profile: Fast alignment tool for genome sequences
tools.detailed_description: A system for rapidly aligning entire genomes, whether in complete or draft form.

tools.name: UCEpipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Find ultra-conserved elements from genome alignments
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to identify ultra-conserved elements (UCEs) from pairwise genome alignments.

tools.name: bwapy
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings to bwa mem
tools.detailed_description: Python bindings for the BWA-MEM aligner, allowing direct usage of BWA algorithms within Python scripts.

tools.name: minimappy
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings to minimap2
tools.detailed_description: Python bindings for the minimap2 aligner, facilitating its integration into Python-based bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: ElasticBLAST
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud-based tool to perform BLAST searches on AWS or GCP
tools.detailed_description: ElasticBLAST is a cloud-based tool designed to handle BLAST searches by distributing the workload across cloud resources (AWS or GCP), making it faster and more effective for large-scale sequence alignment tasks.

tools.name: gapmm2
tools.one_line_profile: Gapped alignment wrapper using minimap2 for transcript-to-genome alignment
tools.detailed_description: gapmm2 is a tool that performs gapped alignment by utilizing minimap2, specifically designed to align transcripts to a genome, facilitating splice-aware mapping.

tools.name: nf-core/methylseq
tools.one_line_profile: Methylation (Bisulfite-Sequencing) analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for Bisulfite-Sequencing analysis, integrating tools like Bismark, bwa-meth, and MethylDackel for alignment and methylation calling.

tools.name: nf-core/rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: RNA sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-seq analysis pipeline built with Nextflow, utilizing aligners like STAR, HISAT2, or Salmon for quantification and quality control.

tools.name: nf-core/scrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-Seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for processing single-cell RNA-seq data, supporting barcode-based protocols (10x, DropSeq, SmartSeq) and various alignment tools.

tools.name: NGLess
tools.one_line_profile: Domain specific language for NGS data processing
tools.detailed_description: NGLess is a domain-specific language and toolkit designed to simplify Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data processing, enabling reproducible and concise analysis pipelines.

tools.name: r-index
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal space run-length Burrows-Wheeler transform full-text index
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the r-index, a space-efficient full-text index based on the run-length encoded Burrows-Wheeler Transform (RLBWT), useful for indexing highly repetitive genomic collections.

tools.name: comb
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical nucleotide sequence alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A graphical tool for nucleotide sequence alignment, providing visualization and alignment capabilities for sequence analysis.

tools.name: libggsea
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-to-Graph Seed-and-Extend Alignment library
tools.detailed_description: A C library implementing Graph-to-Graph Seed-and-Extend Alignment algorithms, suitable for aligning sequences represented as graphs.

tools.name: minialign
tools.one_line_profile: Fast alignment tool for PacBio and Nanopore long reads
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate alignment tool specifically designed for PacBio and Nanopore long reads, primarily for algorithm evaluation purposes.

tools.name: mm2-ivh
tools.one_line_profile: Minimap2 with interval hashing
tools.detailed_description: A modification of the minimap2 aligner that incorporates interval hashing techniques for sequence mapping.

tools.name: prrn_aln
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise and multiple sequence alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing pairwise and multiple sequence alignment of DNA or protein sequences, developed by Osamu Gotoh.

tools.name: spaln
tools.one_line_profile: Genome mapping and spliced alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: SPALN (Space-efficient Spliced Alignment) is a tool for mapping and spliced alignment of cDNA or amino acid sequences to a reference genome.

tools.name: GRiD
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial growth rate measurement from reference genomes
tools.detailed_description: Growth Rate Index (GRiD) measures bacterial growth rates from reference genomes and metagenomic bins, effective even at ultra-low sequencing coverage.

tools.name: GenomicBreaks
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise Alignment Breakpoint Analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for analyzing breakpoints in pairwise genome alignments, useful for studying structural variations and synteny.

tools.name: GSSplayground
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight genome segments visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A single-HTML-file based tool for visualizing genome features, synteny, and read mappings (short/long reads), supporting interactive modification of features.

tools.name: bam2msa
tools.one_line_profile: Convert BAM alignment to MSA
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert alignment files (BAM) into pairwise alignment or multiple sequence alignment (MSA) formats for specific genomic regions.

tools.name: kallisto
tools.one_line_profile: Near-optimal RNA-Seq quantification
tools.detailed_description: kallisto is a program for near-optimal RNA-Seq quantification. It uses pseudo-alignment to rapidly determine the compatibility of reads with targets, without the need for alignment.

tools.name: kallistobustools
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for pre-processing single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A workflow combining kallisto and bustools for efficient pre-processing of single-cell RNA-seq data, handling barcode processing and quantification.

tools.name: kb-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for kallisto | bustools workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper that simplifies running the kallisto | bustools workflow for single-cell RNA-seq pre-processing.

tools.name: kite
tools.one_line_profile: kallisto index tag extractor
tools.detailed_description: A tool to extract tags for kallisto indexing, facilitating Feature Barcoding analysis in single-cell sequencing.

tools.name: metakallisto
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic analysis using kallisto
tools.detailed_description: Tools and scripts for applying kallisto's pseudo-alignment approach to metagenomic data analysis.

tools.name: pa-types
tools.one_line_profile: Basic types and functions for pairwise alignment in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library providing basic data types and functions for implementing pairwise sequence alignment algorithms.

tools.name: galaxy_blast
tools.one_line_profile: Galaxy wrappers for NCBI BLAST+
tools.detailed_description: A collection of wrappers to integrate NCBI BLAST+ tools into the Galaxy bioinformatics platform.

tools.name: panspace
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding-based indexing for bacterial pan-genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for compact storage and rapid querying of bacterial pan-genomes using embedding-based indexing techniques.

tools.name: NGMLR
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read mapper for structural variations
tools.detailed_description: NGMLR is a long-read mapper designed to align PacBio or Oxford Nanopore reads to a reference genome, optimized for detecting structural variations.

tools.name: bwa-pssm
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic short read mapper using BWT
tools.detailed_description: A Burrows-Wheeler Transform-based probabilistic short read mapper that incorporates Position Specific Scoring Matrices (PSSM) for alignment.

tools.name: mindex
tools.one_line_profile: Genome indexing tool for read screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool for indexing genomes to facilitate the screening of read sets.

tools.name: pizzly
tools.one_line_profile: Fast fusion detection using kallisto
tools.detailed_description: Pizzly is a tool for fast gene fusion detection from RNA-Seq data, utilizing pseudo-alignments generated by kallisto.

tools.name: symphonypy
tools.one_line_profile: Python port of Symphony for single-cell reference mapping
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Symphony algorithm for mapping single-cell query data to a reference atlas.

tools.name: ProPhex
tools.one_line_profile: Exact k-mer index using Burrows-Wheeler Transform
tools.detailed_description: ProPhex is a tool that implements an exact k-mer index using the Burrows-Wheeler Transform, enabling efficient sequence querying.

tools.name: WFA-GPU
tools.one_line_profile: GPU implementation of the Wavefront Alignment Algorithm for sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated implementation of the Wavefront Alignment (WFA) algorithm, designed for fast and exact gap-affine pairwise sequence alignment.

tools.name: Accel-Align
tools.one_line_profile: Fast seed-embed-extend based sequence mapper and aligner
tools.detailed_description: A fast sequence mapper and aligner that uses a seed-embed-extend strategy to improve performance for next-generation sequencing data.

tools.name: URMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast read mapper for next-generation sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: An ultra-fast read mapper developed by Robert Edgar, designed for efficient mapping of sequencing reads.

tools.name: AGAThA
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated guided sequence alignment for long read mapping
tools.detailed_description: A fast and efficient GPU acceleration tool for guided sequence alignment, specifically optimized for long read mapping tasks.

tools.name: fstalign
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFST-based tool for aligning transcript sequences and calculating WER
tools.detailed_description: An efficient tool based on OpenFST for aligning two transcript sequences and calculating metrics like Word Error Rate (WER), primarily used in speech processing.

tools.name: pbwt
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Positional Burrows-Wheeler Transform for genetic data
tools.detailed_description: A reference implementation of the Positional Burrows-Wheeler Transform (PBWT) for efficient haplotype matching and storage of genetic data.

tools.name: WordSequenceAligner
tools.one_line_profile: Java tool to align word sequences and calculate WER
tools.detailed_description: A library for aligning word sequences and calculating error metrics such as Word Error Rate (WER), useful in NLP and speech recognition evaluation.

tools.name: wtdbg2
tools.one_line_profile: Fuzzy Bruijn graph approach to long noisy reads assembly
tools.detailed_description: A de novo sequence assembler for long noisy reads (PacBio/Nanopore) that uses a fuzzy Bruijn graph (FBG) approach, also known as Redbean.

tools.name: mummer-idotplot
tools.one_line_profile: Generate interactive dotplot from mummer4 output
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool that generates interactive dotplots from MUMmer4 alignment output using Plotly, facilitating genome alignment analysis.

tools.name: pymummer
tools.one_line_profile: Python3 module for running MUMmer and reading the output
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the MUMmer alignment package, allowing users to run alignments and parse output files programmatically.

tools.name: hmmcopy_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for extracting read counts and statistics for HMMCopy
tools.detailed_description: A set of C++ utilities for processing sequencing data to extract read counts, GC content, and mappability statistics required for HMMCopy analysis.

tools.name: bwt
tools.one_line_profile: Burrows-Wheeler Transform and FM-index implementation in Go
tools.detailed_description: A Go library implementing the Burrows-Wheeler Transform (BWT) and FM-index, fundamental data structures for sequence alignment and indexing.

tools.name: WFA
tools.one_line_profile: Wavefront Alignment Algorithm for exact gap-affine pairwise alignment
tools.detailed_description: The reference implementation of the Wavefront Alignment (WFA) algorithm, providing fast and exact gap-affine pairwise sequence alignment.

tools.name: rna-seq-kallisto-sleuth
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq analysis with Kallisto and Sleuth
tools.detailed_description: A standardized Snakemake workflow for performing differential expression analysis on RNA-seq data using Kallisto for quantification and Sleuth for statistical analysis.

tools.name: blastfoam
tools.one_line_profile: CFD solver for multi-component compressible flow and high-explosive detonation
tools.detailed_description: A solver based on OpenFOAM for simulating compressible multi-component flow, specifically designed for high-explosive detonation, air blast, and explosive safety applications.

tools.name: MCScan
tools.one_line_profile: Synteny detection and evolutionary analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A command-line program that wraps dagchainer to combine pairwise alignment results into multi-alignments, used for detecting synteny and collinearity blocks in comparative genomics.

tools.name: DAMAPPER
tools.one_line_profile: Long read to reference genome mapping tool
tools.detailed_description: A mapping tool designed by Gene Myers for aligning long sequencing reads to a reference genome, focusing on efficiency and accuracy for long-read data.

tools.name: MapQC
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control metric for single-cell query-to-reference mappings
tools.detailed_description: A tool to evaluate the quality of mapping single-cell query datasets to reference atlases, providing metrics to assess the reliability of label transfer and integration.

tools.name: scArches
tools.one_line_profile: Reference mapping tool for single-cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for mapping query single-cell datasets onto reference atlases without sharing raw data, enabling efficient integration and annotation transfer.

tools.name: fishpond
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression and allelic analysis for RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for differential expression and allelic analysis of RNA-seq data using nonparametric statistics, designed to work with inferential replicates from tools like Salmon or Kallisto.

tools.name: IPP
tools.one_line_profile: Interspecies Point Projection for comparative genomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for comparative genomics that projects genomic coordinates between species, enabling analysis beyond alignable sequences by using whole-genome alignments.

tools.name: Reciprocal Smallest Distance (RSD)
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise orthology detection algorithm
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm that uses global sequence alignment and maximum likelihood evolutionary distance to accurately detect orthologs between genomes, improving upon reciprocal best hits.

tools.name: dotPlotly
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive dot plot generator for genome alignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate interactive dot plots from MUMmer or Minimap2 alignment outputs, facilitating the visualization of structural variations and synteny between genomes.

tools.name: snp-dists
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise SNP distance matrix calculator from FASTA alignment
tools.detailed_description: A fast tool to convert a FASTA sequence alignment into a pairwise SNP distance matrix, commonly used in pathogen genomics and epidemiology.

tools.name: TUCCA RNA-Seq
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-Seq workflow for quantification and differential expression
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-Seq workflow that handles read quantification, differential expression analysis, and pathway enrichment analysis.

tools.name: Aladdin
tools.one_line_profile: Joint atlas building and diffeomorphic registration tool
tools.detailed_description: A framework for joint atlas building and diffeomorphic registration learning using pairwise alignment, applicable in medical imaging and structural biology.

tools.name: STRspy
tools.one_line_profile: Short tandem repeat (STR) detection for long-read sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for detecting and quantifying short tandem repeats (STRs) specifically in long-read sequencing data from Oxford Nanopore and PacBio platforms.

tools.name: vg
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for working with genome variation graphs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for creating, manipulating, and analyzing genome variation graphs, enabling pangenome analysis and mapping to graph references.

tools.name: AmpliconArchitect
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for elucidating the architecture of focal amplifications
tools.detailed_description: A tool to identify and reconstruct the fine structure of focally amplified genomic regions (amplicons) using NGS data, useful for cancer genomics.

tools.name: LordFAST
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitive and fast alignment search tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A read aligner designed for long-read sequencing data (PacBio, ONT), focusing on high sensitivity and speed for mapping noisy long reads.

tools.name: SeqLib
tools.one_line_profile: C++ interface for BWA-MEM, Fermi, and HTSlib
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library that provides an integrated interface to BWA-MEM, Fermi, and HTSlib, facilitating the development of high-performance bioinformatics tools for sequence analysis.

tools.name: SALT
tools.one_line_profile: SNP-aware short read aligner
tools.detailed_description: A short read aligner that explicitly accounts for SNPs during the alignment process to improve mapping accuracy in polymorphic regions.

tools.name: SequenceServer
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical web interface for running BLAST
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly web interface for setting up and running a custom BLAST server, making sequence alignment accessible via a browser.

tools.name: CoverM
tools.one_line_profile: Read alignment statistics calculator for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating coverage and other alignment statistics from metagenomic read mappings, optimized for speed and ease of use.

tools.name: PatchWorkPlot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for pairwise alignments of multiple sequences
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based visualization tool designed to display pairwise alignments of multiple sequences, aiding in the comparative analysis of genomic data.

tools.name: Darwin
tools.one_line_profile: Co-processor framework for accelerated long read alignment
tools.detailed_description: A hardware-software co-design framework and reference implementation for accelerating long read sequence alignment, specifically targeting third-generation sequencing data.

tools.name: kallisto2matrix
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to convert Kallisto/Salmon quantification results to expression matrices
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based utility to aggregate quantification results from pseudo-alignment tools like Kallisto and Salmon into TPM, Count, or FPKM matrices for downstream analysis.

tools.name: ikra
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq analysis pipeline centered on Salmon quantification
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based RNA-seq data processing pipeline that integrates Salmon for quantification, streamlining the workflow from raw reads to expression estimation.

tools.name: HiFi-SR
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detecting plant mitochondrial structural rearrangements
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based pipeline designed to detect structural rearrangements in plant mitochondrial genomes using PacBio HiFi or CCS reads mapped to a reference genome.

tools.name: PHFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fragment assembly tool using proxy-level hybrid transformer
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of PHFormer, a deep learning-based approach for multi-fragment assembly tasks, utilizing a proxy-level hybrid transformer architecture.

tools.name: ICRA_ASP
tools.one_line_profile: Robotic assembly sequence planning with Graph Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A planning tool for robotic assembly sequences utilizing Graph Transformers, designed for manufacturing and robotics research contexts.

tools.name: SpadeR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for biodiversity index computation and community analysis
tools.detailed_description: Provides functions to compute various biodiversity indices and related (dis)similarity measures based on individual-based (abundance) or sampling-unit-based (incidence) data.

tools.name: Bin Chicken
tools.one_line_profile: Recovery of low abundance MAGs through strategic coassembly
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the recovery of low abundance and taxonomically targeted metagenome assembled genomes (MAGs) using strategic coassembly methods.

tools.name: INNUca
tools.one_line_profile: QC and de novo assembly workflow for bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for quality control of reads, de novo assembly, and contig quality assessment, including contamination search, developed for the INNUENDO project.

tools.name: Hercules
tools.one_line_profile: Profile HMM-based hybrid error correction for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid error correction algorithm for long reads (e.g., Nanopore/PacBio) that utilizes Profile HMMs to improve sequence accuracy.

tools.name: proovread
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio hybrid error correction through iterative short read consensus
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid correction pipeline for PacBio reads that uses short reads (Illumina) to iteratively correct errors through consensus.

tools.name: LR_Gapcloser
tools.one_line_profile: Gap closing tool for assemblies using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses long sequenced reads to close gaps in genome assemblies, improving contiguity.

tools.name: IRMA
tools.one_line_profile: Iterative Refinement Meta-Assembler for viruses
tools.detailed_description: A highly configurable and adaptive tool designed for the robust assembly of viral genomes, particularly useful for complex or variable viral populations.

tools.name: Apollo
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly polishing algorithm for error correction
tools.detailed_description: An assembly polishing algorithm that attempts to correct errors in genome assemblies using multiple sets of reads, applicable to genomes of any size.

tools.name: Rawasm
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly from raw nanopore signals
tools.detailed_description: A patch for miniasm that enables the construction of genome assemblies directly from raw nanopore electrical signals.

tools.name: PathSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for discovery of microbial sequences in metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool to enable the discovery and identification of microbial sequences in metagenomic samples, including tools for viral integration site identification.

tools.name: GRACE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Assembly processing networks for robotic assembly
tools.detailed_description: A framework using Graph Assembly processing networks for robotic assembly sequence planning and feasibility learning.

tools.name: Ratatosk
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid error correction of long reads using colored de Bruijn graphs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for hybrid error correction of long sequencing reads by utilizing colored de Bruijn graphs to improve accuracy.

tools.name: viralFlye
tools.one_line_profile: Viral assembly pipeline based on Flye
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for viral genome assembly, leveraging the Flye assembler architecture.

tools.name: RAMPART
tools.one_line_profile: Configurable de novo assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A configurable pipeline for de novo genome assembly, designed to streamline the assembly process.

tools.name: indel_correction_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for correcting heterozygote indel errors in assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to correct heterozygote indel errors in Falcon assemblies that remain after Quiver and Pilon polishing.

tools.name: aurora-unicycler
tools.one_line_profile: Battery cycling protocol converter
tools.detailed_description: A tool to define battery cycling protocols and convert them to various formats (Neware, Biologic, PyBaMM) for materials science research.

tools.name: FastMLST
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-core tool for multilocus sequence typing
tools.detailed_description: A fast, multi-core tool for performing multilocus sequence typing (MLST) on draft genome assemblies.

tools.name: WeFaceNano
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore plasmid assembly and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Nanopore data that handles FAST5 basecalling, assembly, plasmid identification, and antimicrobial resistance gene detection.

tools.name: Minia
tools.one_line_profile: Short-read assembler based on a de Bruijn graph
tools.detailed_description: A short-read assembler that utilizes a de Bruijn graph structure, optimized for low memory usage.

tools.name: assembler-components
tools.one_line_profile: Components for building genome assembly tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of software components and libraries designed to assist in the development of genome sequence assembly tools, adhering to GFA specifications.

tools.name: metaMDBG
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight assembler for long metagenomics reads
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight assembler designed for long and accurate metagenomics reads, utilizing de Bruijn graphs.

tools.name: nanoflow
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for de novo assembly of nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based workflow for the de novo assembly of Oxford Nanopore sequencing reads.

tools.name: hybrid-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for hybrid assembly using short and long reads
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Nextflow that combines short and long sequencing reads to perform hybrid genome assembly.

tools.name: hapcorrect
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype phase-switching error correction tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to correct haplotype phase-switching errors in long-read sequencing data, improving the quality of phased assemblies.

tools.name: Simple-Circularise
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to circularise linear sequences overlapped during assembly
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility to circularise linear sequences that represent circular genomes (e.g., plasmids, mitochondria) but were output as linear contigs with overlaps by the assembler.

tools.name: MeGAMerge
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to merge assembled contigs and long reads from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Perl-based tool developed by LANL for merging assembled contigs and long reads from metagenomic sequencing runs to improve assembly continuity.

tools.name: ont-assembly-snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for bacterial genome assembly and polishing using ONT reads
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the assembly and polishing of bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data.

tools.name: score-assemblies
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for scoring and comparing bacterial genome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow to score and compare multiple bacterial genome assemblies (Illumina, Nanopore) against reference genomes, facilitating quality assessment.

tools.name: colora
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for de novo genome assembly and phasing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for de novo genome assembly that produces chromosome-scale primary and phased assemblies, including organelle genomes, and performs automatic quality assessment.

tools.name: DeChat
tools.one_line_profile: Repeat and haplotype aware error correction for nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for correcting errors in nanopore sequencing reads, specifically designed to handle repeats and haplotypes to improve data quality.

tools.name: CAT_pack
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for taxonomic classification of contigs and MAGs
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools (CAT, BAT, RAT) for the taxonomic classification of contigs and metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), as well as taxonomic profiling of metagenomes.

tools.name: Jaeger
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for detecting phages in sequence assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A quick and precise tool designed to detect bacteriophage sequences within genomic assemblies, aiding in viral identification.

tools.name: multi-metagenome
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts and workflow for assembling microbial genomes from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tutorials that function as a workflow for the differential binning and assembly of individual microbial genomes from metagenomic data.

tools.name: Inspector
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for evaluating long-read de novo assembly results
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to evaluate the quality of de novo genome assemblies generated from long-read sequencing data, identifying structural and base-level errors.

tools.name: MiRCA
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid error correction tool for NGS long reads
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid error correction tool that utilizes short reads to correct errors in Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) long reads.

tools.name: NovoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for building whole genome graphs from long-read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed to construct whole genome graphs using de novo assemblies derived from long-read sequencing data, aiding in pangenome analysis.

tools.name: de-novo-transcriptome-assembly-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Combined de novo transcriptome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline script for running multiple de novo transcriptome assemblers with various parameters to optimize assembly quality.

tools.name: IMSindel
tools.one_line_profile: Intermediate-size indel detection tool using de novo assembly
tools.detailed_description: An accurate tool for detecting intermediate-size insertions and deletions (indels) by incorporating de novo assembly and split read analysis.

tools.name: HECIL
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid error correction of long reads using iterative learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for hybrid error correction of long sequencing reads that employs an iterative learning approach to improve accuracy.

tools.name: temperate-phage-active-prophage-detection
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to detect temperate phages in bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for detecting temperate phages (active prophages) within assembled bacterial genome sequences.

tools.name: NextDenovo
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate de novo assembler for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A string graph-based de novo assembler designed for long reads (PacBio/ONT), known for its speed and accuracy in assembling large genomes.

tools.name: NextPolish
tools.one_line_profile: Genome polishing tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool to fix base errors (SNV/Indel) in genomes generated by noisy long reads, utilizing both short and long reads for polishing.

tools.name: NextPolish2
tools.one_line_profile: Repeat-aware polishing for HiFi long read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: The successor to NextPolish, specifically optimized for repeat-aware polishing of genomes assembled using PacBio HiFi long reads.

tools.name: Mapler
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly and evaluation pipeline for HiFi reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for metagenome assembly and evaluation, with a focus on PacBio HiFi long reads, supporting hybrid assembly approaches.

tools.name: nanite
tools.one_line_profile: Oxford Nanopore Viral Metagenomics Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined pipeline for processing Oxford Nanopore viral metagenomics data, handling assembly and analysis.

tools.name: ELBA
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel string graph construction for de novo assembly
tools.detailed_description: A tool for parallel string graph construction, transitive reduction, and contig generation, aimed at efficient de novo genome assembly.

tools.name: pb-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio Assembly Tool Suite
tools.detailed_description: The official suite of assembly tools from Pacific Biosciences, including Falcon and other utilities for assembling PacBio long reads.

tools.name: TransPi
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive transcriptome analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline for de novo transcriptome assembly and analysis, automating multiple steps from quality control to annotation.

tools.name: LandR
tools.one_line_profile: Landscape Ecosystem Modelling in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for simulation and modelling of landscape ecosystems, often used in conjunction with the SpaDES framework.

tools.name: NetLogoR
tools.one_line_profile: R implementation of NetLogo functions for agent-based modelling
