tools.name: pySpade
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of differential gene expression in single cell perturbations
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for analyzing differential gene expression in single-cell perturbation experiments (Single cell Perturbations - Analysis of Differential gene Expression).

tools.name: DEIVA
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visual analysis of differential gene expression
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for the interactive visual analysis of differential gene expression test results.

tools.name: ascend
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Single Cell Expression, Normalisation and Differential expression
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a workflow for the analysis of single cell expression data, including normalization and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: Taxor
tools.one_line_profile: Fast taxonomic classification of long reads
tools.detailed_description: A fast and space-efficient tool for taxonomic classification of long DNA reads, utilizing a pseudo-mapping approach.

tools.name: RNAseqChef
tools.one_line_profile: Web app for automated RNA-seq differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: A web application that automates systematic and integrated differential expression analysis for RNA-seq data.

tools.name: volcano3D
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 3D plotting for differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package to plot interactive three-way differential expression analysis results in a 3D volcano plot.

tools.name: miR-MaGiC
tools.one_line_profile: miRNA quantification from small RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool for the quantification of miRNA expression from small RNA-seq data.

tools.name: CppWeightedLowess
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of limma::weightedLowess
tools.detailed_description: A standalone C++ implementation of the weightedLowess algorithm from the limma package, used for normalization and smoothing in genomic data analysis.

tools.name: deseq2py
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for DESeq2
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the DESeq2 R package, designed to be compatible with Scanpy for differential expression analysis in Python workflows.

tools.name: DEGA
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for Differential Gene Expression Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate differential gene expression analysis.

tools.name: Rcount
tools.one_line_profile: Simple and flexible RNA-Seq read counting
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for simple and flexible counting of RNA-Seq reads mapping to genomic features.

tools.name: multi_padlock_design
tools.one_line_profile: Padlock probe design pipeline for multiplexed assays
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for designing padlock probes for multiplexed assays with multiple probes per target, used in cDNA-based expression profiling.

tools.name: ReapTEC
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for gene expression and enhancer activity profiling
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to simultaneously profile gene expression and enhancer activity in 5' scRNA-seq datasets.

tools.name: DegNorm
tools.one_line_profile: Normalizing RNA degradation in RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for correcting and normalizing RNA degradation effects in RNA-seq data to improve quantification accuracy.

tools.name: SigEMD
tools.one_line_profile: Differential gene expression analysis in single-cell RNAseq
tools.detailed_description: An R package for differential gene expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data using a method based on the Earth Mover's Distance.

tools.name: SpatialDecon
tools.one_line_profile: Mixed cell deconvolution in spatial gene expression datasets
tools.detailed_description: An R library implementing the SpatialDecon algorithm for mixed cell deconvolution in spatial gene expression datasets, also applicable to bulk expression data.

tools.name: EQP-cluster
tools.one_line_profile: Unix-based RNA-seq quantification pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Unix-based pipeline for RNA-seq quantification, developed by Novartis.

tools.name: Corset
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering de novo assembled transcripts and counting reads
tools.detailed_description: Software for clustering de novo assembled transcripts and counting overlapping reads to improve quantification in de novo transcriptomics.

tools.name: SARTools
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical Analysis of RNA-Seq Tools
tools.detailed_description: An R package dedicated to the statistical analysis of RNA-Seq data, providing a pipeline for differential expression analysis using DESeq2 or edgeR.

tools.name: Cepo
tools.one_line_profile: Uncovering cell identity genes using differential stability
tools.detailed_description: An R package for uncovering cell identity genes using differential stability of expression in single cells.

tools.name: GemmaDE
tools.one_line_profile: R package for discovering biological conditions associated with differential gene expression
tools.detailed_description: GemmaDE allows users to discover biological conditions associated with differential gene expression by compiling information from over 10,000 published experiments available in the Gemma database.

tools.name: OpDEA
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for optimal workflow recommendation for proteomics differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: OpDEA provides a toolkit to recommend optimal workflows for differential expression analysis in proteomics data, helping researchers select the best methods for their specific datasets.

tools.name: DeepDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for predicting differential gene expression from histone modifications
tools.detailed_description: DeepDiff uses deep learning techniques to predict differential gene expression based on histone modification data, bridging epigenomics and transcriptomics.

tools.name: YARN
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Multi-Tissue RNA-Seq Preprocessing and Normalization
tools.detailed_description: YARN (Yet Another RNA-Seq Normalizer) is an R package designed for robust preprocessing and normalization of multi-tissue RNA-seq data, particularly useful for large-scale tissue expression datasets.

tools.name: rRMSAnalyzer
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of RiboMethSeq (RNA 2'-O-methylation) data
tools.detailed_description: A set of functions to analyze end read count data from RiboMethSeq experiments, aiding in the detection and quantification of RNA 2'-O-methylation.

tools.name: RNA-Seq-kallisto
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq analysis pipeline using Kallisto and DESeq2
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for analyzing Illumina RNA sequencing data, performing differential expression analysis using Kallisto for quantification and DESeq2 for statistical testing.

tools.name: STCellbin
tools.one_line_profile: Generating single-cell gene expression profile for spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: Enhanced application for generating single-cell gene expression profiles from high-resolution spatial transcriptomics data, facilitating spatial analysis at the cellular level.

tools.name: Macrophage_framework
tools.one_line_profile: Predictive framework for macrophage activation heterogeneity
tools.detailed_description: A predictive model and framework to map and contextualize macrophage heterogeneity and activation across tissues and inflammatory conditions based on transcriptional profiles.

tools.name: ORNA
tools.one_line_profile: Fast in-silico normalization algorithm for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: ORNA is a fast algorithm for in-silico normalization of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, reducing dataset size while preserving biological information.

tools.name: Searchlight2
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualisation for bulk and pseudo-bulk RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid analysis and visualization of bulk RNA-seq, pseudo-bulk RNA-seq, GeoMx, and Proteomic datasets.

tools.name: TumorDecon
tools.one_line_profile: Tumor deconvolution software for estimating cell type fractions
tools.detailed_description: TumorDecon takes gene expression profiles of tumors as input and estimates the relative numbers of different cell types within the tumor microenvironment.

tools.name: Subread
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing next-gen sequencing data including alignment and quantification
tools.detailed_description: The Subread software package includes the Subread aligner, Subjunc exon-exon junction detector, and featureCounts for efficient read summarization.

tools.name: OmicVerse
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for multi-omics analysis including bulk, single-cell and spatial RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: OmicVerse is a comprehensive Python library designed for the analysis of multi-omics data, supporting bulk RNA-seq, single-cell RNA-seq, and spatial transcriptomics workflows.

tools.name: edge
tools.one_line_profile: R package for identifying differentially expressed genes
tools.detailed_description: The edge package implements methods for identifying differentially expressed genes in genome-wide gene expression profiling studies, particularly for time-course experiments.

tools.name: IDEAS
tools.one_line_profile: Individual level Differential Expression Analysis for Single cells
tools.detailed_description: IDEAS is a method for performing differential expression analysis at the individual level for single-cell RNA-seq data, accounting for biological variability.

tools.name: GEMmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for construction of Gene Expression count Matrices
tools.detailed_description: GEMmaker is a Nextflow workflow for constructing Gene Expression Matrices (GEMs) from RNA-seq data, facilitating Differential Gene Expression (DGE) analysis and Gene Co-Expression Network (GCN) construction.

tools.name: readquant
tools.one_line_profile: Package for parsing RNA-seq quantification results
tools.detailed_description: A convenience package for parsing and handling RNA-seq quantification results, facilitating downstream analysis.

tools.name: DTUrtle
tools.one_line_profile: Differential transcript usage (DTU) analysis of bulk or single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: DTUrtle performs differential transcript usage (DTU) analysis, allowing researchers to detect changes in transcript isoform abundance across conditions in bulk or single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: AIDE
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation-assisted isoform discovery and quantification from RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A statistical method and tool for isoform discovery and quantification that leverages existing annotations to improve accuracy in RNA-seq analysis.

tools.name: TCellSI
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to assess T-cell states from gene expression profiles
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed to evaluate the degree of eight distinct T-cell states based on gene expression data.

tools.name: bayNorm
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian normalization method for single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for normalizing single-cell RNA-seq data using a Bayesian approach to infer true counts and reduce technical noise.

tools.name: outrigger
tools.one_line_profile: De novo alternative splicing analysis and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create a de novo alternative splicing database, validate splicing events, and quantify percent spliced-in (Psi) from RNA-seq data.

tools.name: LineagePulse
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis for single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A statistical framework for differential expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data, accounting for dropout and cell lineage structures.

tools.name: Bulk_RNA-Seq_Workflow_Snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for bulk RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow integrating STAR, Cufflinks, and DESeq2 for bulk RNA-seq alignment, quantification, and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: bulk2space
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial deconvolution of bulk transcriptomes
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based spatial deconvolution method that converts bulk transcriptomes into spatially resolved single-cell expression profiles.

tools.name: GeneBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting differential gene expression from histone modifications using RoBERTa
tools.detailed_description: A model combining RoBERTa (trained on histone modification patterns) and XGBoost to predict differential gene expression.

tools.name: IsoQuant
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript discovery and quantification for long RNA reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the discovery and quantification of transcripts using long RNA sequencing reads from Nanopore and PacBio platforms.

tools.name: GPatch
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-guided contig assembly tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to assemble contigs into a chromosome-scale pseudo-assembly using alignments to a reference sequence.

tools.name: arseq
tools.one_line_profile: Automated RNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline for RNA-seq analysis covering steps from differential expression to gene enrichment analysis.

tools.name: DEQ
tools.one_line_profile: Differential methylation analysis for MeRIP/m6A-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R package to conveniently run DESeq2, edgeR, and QNB for the detection of differential methylation in MeRIP/m6A-seq data.

tools.name: ballgown
tools.one_line_profile: Isoform-level differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Bioconductor package for isoform-level differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data, designed to work with StringTie assemblies.

tools.name: scMatch
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell gene expression profile annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for annotating single-cell gene expression profiles by matching them to reference datasets.

tools.name: profDGE48
tools.one_line_profile: Profiling highly replicated differential gene expression RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: Code base and tools for profiling highly replicated differential gene expression in RNA-seq experiments.

tools.name: wastewater_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: SARS-CoV-2 variant abundance estimation from wastewater
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating the abundance of SARS-CoV-2 variants in wastewater samples using RNA-Seq quantification.

tools.name: RNASeq-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq quantification and enrichment analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for RNA-seq data processing, including quantification and downstream enrichment analysis.

tools.name: MTX_model
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis in metatranscriptomics
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for differential expression analysis specifically in the context of metatranscriptomics data.

tools.name: chip_seq_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: ChIP-Seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for ChIP-Seq data analysis with an emphasis on differential expression/binding analysis.

tools.name: tecount
tools.one_line_profile: Transposable element read counting tool
tools.detailed_description: A package to count reads mapping to transposable elements, aggregating counts by subfamilies, families, and classes.

tools.name: single_cell_classification
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq classification using SNPs or gene expression
tools.detailed_description: A set of methods to classify single cell RNA-seq data to reference profiles using either SNPs or gene expression data, developed by the Broad Institute.

tools.name: StrainZip
tools.one_line_profile: Unified co-assembly and pseudo-alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for unified co-assembly and pseudo-alignment, designed to handle strain-level analysis in sequencing data.

tools.name: powsimR
tools.one_line_profile: Power analysis for bulk and single-cell RNA-seq experiments
tools.detailed_description: A flexible tool to simulate and evaluate differential expression from bulk and single-cell RNA-seq data, essential for optimizing experimental design and assessing statistical power.

tools.name: devil
tools.one_line_profile: Variational inference for single-cell differential gene expression
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing variational inference methods for analyzing differential gene expression in single-cell RNA-seq data across multiple patients.

tools.name: SVExpress
tools.one_line_profile: Structural Variant breakpoint-to-expression association tool
tools.detailed_description: A suite of computational tools implemented in Excel VBA and R to identify associations between Structural Variant (SV) breakpoints and gene expression in cancer samples.

tools.name: RNA-Abundance-Quantification-on-UPMEM
tools.one_line_profile: Kallisto implementation on UPMEM DPU system
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the RNA-seq abundance quantification software 'kallisto' optimized for the UPMEM DPU (Processing-in-Memory) system.

tools.name: dgc_predict
tools.one_line_profile: Tensor completion for drug-gene expression profiles
tools.detailed_description: A tool that applies and evaluates methods to complete partially-observed data tensors, specifically for gene expression profiles corresponding to various drugs and cellular contexts.

tools.name: pytximport
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of tximport for gene count estimation
tools.detailed_description: A feature-rich Python implementation of the R tximport package, used for importing and summarizing transcript-level abundance estimates for gene-level analysis.

tools.name: limma
tools.one_line_profile: Linear Models for Microarray and RNA-seq Data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package for the analysis of gene expression data, providing linear models for assessing differential expression in microarray and RNA-seq experiments.

tools.name: CSBB
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Suite For Bioinformaticians and Biologists
tools.detailed_description: A suite of modules for various bioinformatics tasks, including RNA-seq analysis, visualization, and data processing.

tools.name: SplineOmics
tools.one_line_profile: Time-series analysis of omics data using spline fitting
tools.detailed_description: An R package for time-series analysis of -omics data, utilizing spline curve fitting and limma for hypothesis testing, followed by clustering and over-representation analysis.

tools.name: CRIES
tools.one_line_profile: Counting Reads for Intronic and Exonic Segments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for counting reads mapped to intronic and exonic segments, useful for analyzing pre-mRNA and mRNA dynamics.

tools.name: SL-quant
tools.one_line_profile: Quantification of SL trans-splicing events from RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify and quantify Spliced Leader (SL) trans-splicing events from RNA-seq data.

tools.name: FulQuant
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore long-read transcript isoform quantification
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to identify and quantify transcript isoforms using Nanopore long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: BSRPipline
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for Bulked Segregant RNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the analysis of Bulked Segregant RNA-Seq (BSR-Seq) data, used for mapping genes/traits.

tools.name: bulkrna
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for bulk RNA-seq pre-processing and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A workflow developed by the Dalmolin Group for pre-processing, alignment, and quantification of bulk RNA-seq data.

tools.name: eagle
tools.one_line_profile: Detecting Gene-by-Environment interactions from RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R package for detecting Gene-by-Environment (GxE) interaction effects on the transcriptome using Allele Specific Expression quantified from RNA-seq data.

tools.name: seqgendiff
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence generation for differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for generating RNA-seq data with known differential expression signal, useful for benchmarking and evaluating analysis methods.

tools.name: rpkm_rnaseq_count
tools.one_line_profile: RPKM calculation for RNA-seq counts
tools.detailed_description: A script/tool to calculate RPKM (Reads Per Kilobase Million) values from RNA-seq count data.

tools.name: isobaric-prot-wf-r
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for isobaric-labeling proteomic data analysis using ANOVA, t-testing, and DEqMS/limma
tools.detailed_description: A set of R workflows designed to process isobaric-labeling proteomic data exported from Proteome Discoverer. It performs statistical analysis including ANOVA and t-testing, differential expression analysis using DEqMS or limma, and functional annotation via fgsea.

tools.name: MetaSRA-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for normalizing sample-specific metadata from the Sequence Read Archive
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline designed to standardize and normalize sample-specific metadata associated with RNA-seq samples in the Sequence Read Archive (SRA), facilitating better data retrieval and meta-analysis.

tools.name: RSEM
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate quantification of gene and isoform expression from RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: RSEM (RNA-Seq by Expectation-Maximization) is a software package for estimating gene and isoform expression levels from RNA-Seq data. It is capable of handling data with or without a reference genome and provides accurate abundance estimates.

tools.name: GEO_microarrays
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis of published microarray datasets from GEO
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool (analyze_geo_microarrays.py) for performing differential expression analysis on microarray datasets retrieved from the NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO).

tools.name: TRNet
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network model for predicting drug-induced gene expression profiles
tools.detailed_description: TRNet is a deep learning model designed to predict gene expression profiles induced by drug treatments, aiding in the understanding of drug mechanisms and responses.

tools.name: DrEdGE
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization tool for differential expression gene exploration
tools.detailed_description: DrEdGE (Differential Expression Gene Explorer) is a visualization tool that allows users to interactively explore differential gene expression data, typically from RNA-seq or microarray experiments.

tools.name: RUVSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Remove Unwanted Variation from RNA-Seq Data
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing methods for removing unwanted variation (RUV) from RNA-Seq data to improve differential expression analysis. This repository serves as an archive for the tool.

tools.name: vennt
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Venn diagrams for visualizing differential gene expression sets
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for generating dynamic Venn diagrams to visualize and compare sets of differentially expressed genes, facilitating the analysis of overlaps between different experimental conditions.

tools.name: eQTL-Catalogue RNA-seq Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq quantification pipeline for the eQTL Catalogue
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline used by the eQTL Catalogue for the uniform processing and quantification of RNA-seq data, ensuring consistency across large-scale eQTL studies.

tools.name: circompara2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for identification and quantification of circRNA expression
tools.detailed_description: An improved bioinformatics pipeline that combines multiple detection methods to identify and quantify circular RNA (circRNA) expression from RNA-seq data.

tools.name: dea_limma
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for differential expression analysis using limma
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module designed to perform and visualize differential expression analyses of NGS data, leveraging the statistical power of the R package limma.

tools.name: rnaseq_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq data processing, quantification, and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for the end-to-end processing of RNA-seq data, including alignment, quantification, and feature annotation.

tools.name: spilterlize_integrate
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for filtering, normalizing, and integrating NGS count matrices
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow to split, filter, normalize, integrate, and select highly variable features from NGS count matrices (e.g., RNA-seq, ATAC-seq), including confounding factor analysis.

tools.name: SCASA
tools.one_line_profile: Single cell transcript quantification tool
tools.detailed_description: SCASA is a tool designed for the quantification of transcripts in single-cell RNA sequencing data, enabling precise gene expression measurement at the single-cell level.

tools.name: tuxedo-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow implementation of the Tuxedo Suite (HISAT, StringTie, Ballgown)
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the classic Tuxedo suite for RNA-seq analysis, integrating HISAT for alignment, StringTie for assembly/quantification, and Ballgown for differential expression.

tools.name: SmallSeqFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Notebook-based bulk RNA-seq analysis pipeline for small-sample studies
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined, Jupyter notebook-based pipeline for bulk RNA-seq analysis, specifically optimized for studies with small sample sizes, offering modular extensions for custom analysis.

tools.name: DeepGenerativeModelLINCS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative models for learning gene expression latent representations
tools.detailed_description: A set of deep generative models implemented to learn latent representations of gene expression profiles from the LINCS L1000 dataset, useful for dimensionality reduction and feature extraction.

tools.name: kmerfreq
tools.one_line_profile: K-mer frequency counter for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to count K-mer frequencies from input sequence data (reads or reference genomes), generating output compatible with Genomic Character Estimator (GCE) for genome size estimation.

tools.name: ideal
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Differential Expression Analysis (ideal) for RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R/Bioconductor package that provides an interactive Shiny application for differential expression analysis, making the exploration of RNA-seq results accessible and reproducible.

tools.name: prolfqua
tools.one_line_profile: R package for differential expression analysis of proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a toolbox for differential expression analysis of omics data, with a primary focus on proteomics, including quality control, normalization, and statistical modeling.

tools.name: gep2pep
tools.one_line_profile: Conversion of Gene Expression Profiles to Pathway Expression Profiles
tools.detailed_description: An R package for converting gene expression profiles into pathway expression profiles, facilitating pathway-level analysis and interpretation of transcriptomic data.

tools.name: TREX
tools.one_line_profile: Simultaneous lineage tracking and expression profiling of single cells
tools.detailed_description: TREX (TRacking and EXpression) is a workflow for the simultaneous analysis of clonal lineage and gene expression in single cells using RNA-seq data.

tools.name: DREEP
tools.one_line_profile: Drug Response Estimation from single-cell Expression Profiles
tools.detailed_description: DREEP is a computational tool designed to estimate drug response sensitivity from single-cell gene expression profiles, aiding in personalized medicine and drug discovery.

tools.name: RNAnorm
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized normalization of RNA-seq gene expression data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for normalizing RNA-seq gene expression data, implementing standard methods like TPM (Transcripts Per Million) and CPM (Counts Per Million) to ensure comparability across samples.

tools.name: bam-readcount
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to generate per-base read counts from BAM/CRAM files
tools.detailed_description: A command-line utility that counts the number of reads mapping to each base at specific positions in BAM or CRAM files, useful for variant calling validation and quantification.

tools.name: RNA-GAN
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for synthesizing histology images from gene expression
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model that synthesizes whole-slide imaging tiles conditioned on gene expression profiles, bridging transcriptomics and digital pathology.

tools.name: iDEP
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Differential Expression and Pathway analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the iDEP web server, which provides an integrated platform for differential expression analysis, pathway enrichment, and visualization of RNA-seq and microarray data.

tools.name: RNA_Seq_featurecounts
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for RNA-Seq gene counting using featureCounts
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline for processing RNA-Seq data, specifically utilizing the featureCounts tool to generate gene count matrices from alignment files.

tools.name: dtangle
tools.one_line_profile: Cell type deconvolution from gene expression profiles
tools.detailed_description: A computational method and R package for estimating cell type proportions (deconvolution) from high-throughput gene expression profiling experiments.

tools.name: StringTie
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript assembly and quantification for RNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: StringTie is a fast and efficient assembler of RNA-Seq alignments into potential transcripts. It uses a novel network flow algorithm as well as an optional de novo assembly step to assemble and quantitate full-length transcripts representing multiple splice variants for each gene locus.

tools.name: TDM
tools.one_line_profile: R package for normalizing RNA-seq data to match microarray distribution
tools.detailed_description: Training Distribution Matching (TDM) is a method for normalizing RNA-seq data to make it comparable to microarray data, facilitating cross-platform machine learning and analysis.

tools.name: GEOparse
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to access and parse Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) data
tools.detailed_description: GEOparse is a Python library designed to easily access, download, and parse data from the Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) database, supporting SOFT and MINiML formats.

tools.name: rnaflow
tools.one_line_profile: Simple RNA-Seq differential gene expression pipeline using Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: rnaflow is a Nextflow-based pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis, focusing on differential gene expression. It automates the process from raw reads to differential expression results.

tools.name: quanTIseq
tools.one_line_profile: Quantification of the Tumor Immune contexture from human RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: quanTIseq is a computational pipeline for the deconvolution of bulk RNA-seq data to quantify the fractions of ten different immune cell types in heterogeneous samples.

tools.name: cellxgene_VIP
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization in Plugin for cellxgene
tools.detailed_description: cellxgene_VIP is a plugin for the cellxgene viewer that extends its capabilities to include advanced plotting (violin, heatmap, volcano, etc.) and differential gene expression analysis directly within the interactive interface.

tools.name: snakemake-rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq workflow for Snakemake based on STAR and featureCounts
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq analysis, integrating STAR for alignment and featureCounts for quantification, providing a reproducible pipeline for gene expression analysis.

tools.name: docker4seq
tools.one_line_profile: Dockerized NGS computing applications for reads mapping and counting
tools.detailed_description: docker4seq provides a collection of Docker containers wrapping common NGS tools (e.g., for mapping and counting), facilitating reproducible and portable bioinformatics analysis.

tools.name: VERSE
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile and efficient RNA-Seq read counting tool
tools.detailed_description: VERSE is a standalone tool for RNA-Seq read quantification. It supports complex gene structures and various quantification modes, serving as an alternative to tools like featureCounts or htseq-count.

tools.name: Sailfish
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid Mapping-based Isoform Quantification from RNA-Seq Reads
tools.detailed_description: Sailfish is an alignment-free isoform quantification tool for RNA-seq data. It uses lightweight algorithms to estimate transcript abundance rapidly without full alignment.

tools.name: PySNAIL
tools.one_line_profile: Smooth-quantile Normalization Adaptation for Inference of co-expression Links
tools.detailed_description: A computational framework for inferring co-expression links using smooth-quantile normalization adaptation, specifically designed for biological network analysis.

tools.name: Tomographer
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial image reconstruction from read counts
tools.detailed_description: Implements mathematical spatial image reconstruction of any set of read counts, enabling spatial transcriptomics analysis from sequencing data.

tools.name: latch-verified/bulk-rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Bulk RNA-seq analysis workflow on Latch
tools.detailed_description: A verified workflow for bulk RNA-seq analysis, providing a standardized pipeline for processing and quantifying RNA-seq data.

tools.name: derfinder
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation-agnostic differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for annotation-agnostic differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data, operating at expressed regions-level or single base-level.

tools.name: SGSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Splice event prediction and quantification
tools.detailed_description: An R package for predicting and quantifying splice events from RNA-seq data, focusing on splicing analysis.

tools.name: derfinder (leekgroup)
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: R package for DER Finder, a method for differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data (canonical repository).

tools.name: recount

tools.detailed_description: R package for accessing and analyzing data from the recount2 project, facilitating the use of uniformly processed RNA-seq data.

tools.name: regionReport

tools.detailed_description: Generates HTML reports for a set of genomic regions or DESeq2/edgeR results, aiding in the visualization and exploration of differential expression analysis.

tools.name: BamQuery

tools.detailed_description: Provides RNA-seq quantification for a given peptide (8-11 residues) in chosen RNA-seq samples, bridging proteomics and transcriptomics.

tools.name: EBSeq
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-Seq Differential Expression Analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data, using an empirical Bayesian approach.

tools.name: circMeta
tools.one_line_profile: Circular RNA annotation and DE analysis
tools.detailed_description: A unified computational framework for genomic feature annotation and differential expression analysis specifically for circular RNAs.

tools.name: URSM
tools.one_line_profile: Unified RNA Sequencing Model
tools.detailed_description: A Unified RNA Sequencing Model (URSM) for joint analysis of single cell and bulk RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ggvolc
tools.one_line_profile: Volcano plots for differential expression
tools.detailed_description: An R package to easily generate informative volcano plots from differential expression datasets and RNA-seq data.

tools.name: piquant
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript quantification assessment pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to assess the accuracy and performance of transcript quantification tools.

tools.name: conquer
tools.one_line_profile: Consistent quantification of external RNA-seq data sets
tools.detailed_description: Provides consistent quantification of external RNA-seq datasets, facilitating cross-study comparisons and meta-analyses.

tools.name: rna-seq-qc
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq pipeline from FASTQ to DE
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-seq pipeline handling steps from FASTQ processing to differential expression analysis.

tools.name: DOLPHIN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for single-cell RNA-seq quantification
tools.detailed_description: Advances single-cell RNA-seq analysis beyond gene-level by integrating exon-level quantification and junction reads with deep neural networks.

tools.name: MERFISHTools
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian framework for MERFISH data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Implements a Bayesian framework for accurately predicting gene or transcript expression from MERFISH data and performing differential expression analysis.

tools.name: zinbwave-deseq2
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow integrating ZINB-WaVE and DESeq2 for single-cell RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A workflow script demonstrating the integration of ZINB-WaVE (Zero-Inflated Negative Binomial-Based Wanted Variation Extraction) with DESeq2 for differential expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: MindSpore
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework supporting scientific computing and AI4S
tools.detailed_description: An open-source deep learning training and inference framework. While general-purpose, it is a key platform for AI for Science (AI4S) applications, offering specific support for scientific modeling and high-performance computing.

tools.name: Telescope
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for quantification of transposable element expression from RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed to accurately quantify the expression of transposable elements (TEs) in RNA-seq experiments, handling multi-mapping reads to resolve TE ambiguity.

tools.name: SPEED2
tools.one_line_profile: Inference of upstream pathway activity from differential gene expression
tools.detailed_description: A tool to infer upstream signaling pathway activity based on differential gene expression signatures, helping to link gene expression changes to signaling mechanisms.

tools.name: QAPA
tools.one_line_profile: Quantification of Alternative Polyadenylation from RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the quantification of alternative polyadenylation (APA) from standard RNA-seq data, enabling the analysis of 3' UTR usage changes.

tools.name: htseq-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scripts for high-throughput sequencing data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting various scripts and tools for the analysis of high-throughput sequencing data, developed by the MPG Age Bioinformatics group.

tools.name: BSDE
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq differential expression analysis approach
tools.detailed_description: A method for differential expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data, specifically designed for case-control studies.

tools.name: denovo-rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for de novo assembly and differential gene expression
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for de novo transcriptome assembly, annotation, and differential gene expression analysis, suitable for organisms without a reference genome.

tools.name: GlimmaV2
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive graphics for differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R/JavaScript package that generates interactive plots (like MD plots and volcano plots) for exploring differential expression analysis results.

tools.name: pipeline-transcriptome-de

tools.detailed_description: A pipeline developed by Nanopore Tech for analyzing long-read RNA-seq data to perform differential gene expression (DGE) and differential transcript usage (DTU) analysis.

tools.name: NASQAR
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for high-throughput sequencing data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform that provides a user-friendly interface for analyzing and visualizing high-throughput sequencing data, including RNA-seq analysis tools.

tools.name: deseq2shiny
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based Shiny application wrapper for DESeq2
tools.detailed_description: An R Shiny application that provides a graphical user interface for the DESeq2 package, facilitating differential expression analysis for users without coding experience.

tools.name: TPMCalculator
tools.one_line_profile: Quantification of mRNA abundance directly from BAM alignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool that quantifies mRNA abundance (TPM values) directly from alignment files (BAM) by parsing the alignments and gene annotations.

tools.name: nf-core/circrna
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for circRNA quantification and differential expression
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the identification, quantification, and differential expression analysis of circular RNAs (circRNAs) from RNA-seq data, including miRNA target prediction.

tools.name: nf-core/differentialabundance
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for differential abundance analysis of omics data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for performing differential abundance analysis on feature/observation matrices, suitable for RNA-seq counts and other omics data.

tools.name: nf-core/dualrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Dual RNA-seq analysis of host-pathogen interactions
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the analysis of Dual RNA-seq data, enabling simultaneous interrogation of host and pathogen transcriptomes.

tools.name: DGEvistools
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualizing DESeq2 results
tools.detailed_description: A small R package providing functions to visualize differential gene expression (DGE) results downstream of DESeq2 analysis.

tools.name: rna-seq-salmon-deseq2

tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for performing differential transcript analysis on RNA-Seq data, utilizing Salmon for quantification and DESeq2 for statistical analysis.

tools.name: crispr_screen

tools.detailed_description: A tool written in Rust for efficient differential expression analysis and gene aggregation specifically for CRISPR screen data.

tools.name: cTRAP
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of causal perturbations from differential gene expression
tools.detailed_description: An R package to identify candidate causal perturbations (e.g., drugs, gene knockdowns) by comparing differential gene expression results with CMap/LINCS data.

tools.name: rna-seq-diff-exprn
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive RNA-Seq differential expression analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis that performs genome coverage calculation, differential expression (DESeq, NOISeq), structural variant detection, and differential exon usage analysis.

tools.name: Anomalib
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for anomaly detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library for anomaly detection, providing state-of-the-art algorithms. While general-purpose, it is widely applicable in scientific data analysis (e.g., detecting defects or outliers in experimental data).

tools.name: kallisto-transcriptome-indices
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built reference transcriptome indices for kallisto
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pre-built reference transcriptome indices for popular organisms, designed for use with the kallisto quantification tool.

tools.name: kb_python
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the kallisto | bustools single-cell RNA-seq workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper that provides a convenient interface for running the kallisto | bustools workflow, facilitating the pre-processing of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: sleuth
tools.one_line_profile: Differential analysis of RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the differential analysis of RNA-Seq data that utilizes bootstrap quantification estimates from kallisto to improve accuracy.

tools.name: EMSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript quantification from RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: EMSAR quantifies transcripts from RNA-seq data, focusing on accurate estimation of isoform abundance.

tools.name: RankCompV3.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis based on relative expression orderings
tools.detailed_description: A differential expression analysis algorithm implemented in Julia that uses relative expression orderings (REOs) of gene pairs to identify differences.

tools.name: GenExVis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for differential gene expression data
tools.detailed_description: An application designed for exploring and visualizing differential gene expression data generated by DESeq2.

tools.name: r-peridot
tools.one_line_profile: GUI software for Differential Gene Expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: Software providing an intuitive interface for performing Differential Gene Expression (DGE) analysis on Windows and Linux, leveraging R packages.

tools.name: DE_rpy2
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of DESeq2, edgeR, and limma via rpy2
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based implementation for differential expression analysis that wraps standard R tools like DESeq2, edgeR, and limma using rpy2.

tools.name: pipeline-nanopore-ref-isoforms
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating genomes using long read transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for annotating genomes using long-read transcriptomics data, utilizing tools like StringTie.

tools.name: SCALPEL
tools.one_line_profile: Isoform usage and APA quantification from scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline for the quantification of isoform usage and alternative polyadenylation (APA) events from single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: rnadeseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for RNA-seq differential expression and pathway analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for performing differential gene expression analysis and subsequent pathway analysis on RNA-seq data.

tools.name: scProjection
tools.one_line_profile: Projecting RNA measurements onto single cell atlases
tools.detailed_description: A tool for projecting RNA measurements onto single cell atlases to extract cell type-specific expression profiles.

tools.name: edgePy
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of edgeR
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the popular R package edgeR for differential expression analysis of count data.

tools.name: spladder
tools.one_line_profile: Detection and quantification of alternative splicing events
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the detection and quantification of alternative splicing events from RNA-Seq data, enabling detailed splicing analysis.

tools.name: SCnorm
tools.one_line_profile: Normalization for single cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the normalization of single-cell RNA-seq data, addressing the specific noise characteristics of scRNA-seq.

tools.name: Trendy
tools.one_line_profile: Segmented regression analysis of expression dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for segmented regression analysis of expression dynamics for high-throughput ordered profiling experiments.

tools.name: RNASeqDEPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-Seq differential gene expression pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to automate the process of differential gene expression analysis from RNA-Seq data.

tools.name: CardioPipeLine
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline specifically designed for RNA-seq analysis, likely tailored for cardiovascular research contexts given the name.

tools.name: bcbio.rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control and differential expression analysis for bcbio RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A toolset for quality control, differential gene/transcript expression, and pathway analysis for bcbio RNA-seq runs.

tools.name: Core-SNP-filter
tools.one_line_profile: Filter sites in whole-genome pseudo-alignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool to filter sites in a FASTA-format whole-genome pseudo-alignment, useful for SNP analysis.

tools.name: strawberry
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-guided transcript reconstruction and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A program for fast and accurate genome-guided transcript reconstruction and quantification from RNA-seq data, supporting PacBio single-end reads.

tools.name: BEDwARS

tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian approach to deconvolving bulk expression profiles using noisy reference expression profiles of constituent cell types.

tools.name: PyDESeq2

tools.detailed_description: A Python library that implements the DESeq2 method for differential expression analysis of bulk RNA-seq data, enabling statistical testing of count data in Python-based bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: allelecounter

tools.detailed_description: A Python utility designed to generate allele-specific read counts from sequencing data, primarily used for allele-specific expression (ASE) analysis and variant validation.

tools.name: HTSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Library for processing and analysis of high-throughput sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and set of command-line tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing data, widely used for counting reads in features (htseq-count) and processing SAM/BAM files.

tools.name: slowkow/snakefiles
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Snakemake workflows for RNA-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository of reusable Snakemake workflow definitions for common RNA-seq analysis tasks, including alignment (STAR) and quantification (Kallisto), serving as a template for reproducible research.

tools.name: rna-seq-star-deseq2
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq analysis with STAR and DESeq2
tools.detailed_description: A standardized Snakemake workflow for performing RNA-seq analysis, including read alignment with STAR and differential expression analysis with DESeq2.

tools.name: single-cell-rna-seq

tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake workflow for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis, covering quality control, highly variable gene identification, cell type assignment, and differential expression.

tools.name: tradeSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory-based differential expression analysis for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for analyzing gene expression changes along cellular trajectories in single-cell RNA-seq data, allowing for the discovery of genes that are differentially expressed between lineages or along time.

tools.name: diffxpy
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis framework for single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for differential expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data, supporting various statistical tests and handling complex experimental designs.

tools.name: DESeq2

tools.detailed_description: A standard R/Bioconductor package for differential expression analysis of count data (RNA-seq) using shrinkage estimation for dispersions and fold changes.

tools.name: rnaseqGene
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end RNA-seq workflow for exploratory analysis and differential expression
tools.detailed_description: A Bioconductor workflow package providing a complete pipeline for RNA-seq analysis, including data import, quality assessment, and differential expression using DESeq2.

tools.name: tximeta

tools.detailed_description: An R package that facilitates the import of transcript quantification data (from Salmon/alevin) while automatically attaching transcript metadata and annotation.

tools.name: tximport

tools.detailed_description: An R package for importing transcript-level abundance estimates from quantification tools (Salmon, Kallisto, RSEM) and summarizing them for gene-level differential expression analysis.

tools.name: tidybulk
tools.one_line_profile: Tidyverse-compliant framework for bulk RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package that brings bulk and pseudobulk transcriptomics data analysis into the 'tidy' data paradigm, facilitating manipulation and visualization.

tools.name: Whippet.jl

tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for fast and lightweight RNA-seq quantification, focusing on splicing events and isoform complexity.

tools.name: vcf2msa.py

tools.detailed_description: A Python script/package to create pseudo-reference multiple sequence alignments by applying VCF variants to a reference genome.

tools.name: kmtricks

tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for constructing k-mer count matrices and Bloom filters from large collections of sequencing reads, useful for metagenomics and comparative genomics.

tools.name: deldenoiser
