tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to remove the effects of truncated side-products from read count data in DNA-encoded library screens.

tools.name: tucca-rna-seq
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-Seq workflow for quantification and differential expression
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for RNA-seq analysis including read quantification, differential expression analysis, and pathway enrichment.

tools.name: pseudoBulk
tools.one_line_profile: Cluster-specific pseudo-bulk analysis for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool to perform cluster-specific pseudo-bulk analysis of 10X single-cell RNA-seq data, connecting Seurat clusters to RNA-seq pipelines.

tools.name: sc_read_kallisto_wrapper
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for single-cell transcriptomics pipeline using Kallisto
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper script/pipeline for processing single-cell transcriptomics data using Kallisto for pseudoalignment and quantification.

tools.name: Pymportx
tools.one_line_profile: Fast gene count estimation from pseudoalignment outputs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for estimating gene counts from transcript quantification files generated by tools like Salmon or Kallisto.

tools.name: Subread_to_DEXSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for FeatureCounts output to DEXSeq format
tools.detailed_description: Scripts to facilitate the import of FeatureCounts (Subread) output into DEXSeq for differential exon usage analysis.

tools.name: SPLICE-q
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-wide splicing efficiency quantification tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for quantifying genome-wide splicing efficiency from RNA-seq data.

tools.name: sam2counts
tools.one_line_profile: Count mapped reads per reference from SAM files
tools.detailed_description: A utility to count the number of mapped reads for each reference sequence in a SAM file, useful for simple RNA-Seq quantification.

tools.name: LIMMA-pipeline-proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: LIMMA pipeline for proteomic differential expression
tools.detailed_description: An R pipeline using LIMMA (empirical Bayes method) for two-group comparison in proteomic experiments.

tools.name: diffexpr
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for DESeq2 via rpy2
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that ports DESeq2 functionality into Python using rpy2, allowing Python users to run DESeq2 differential expression analysis.

tools.name: DEA.R
tools.one_line_profile: Automated differential expression analysis script
tools.detailed_description: An R script to automate differential expression analysis using popular methods like DESeq2, edgeR, or limma-voom.

tools.name: RNA-seq-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Shell pipeline for RNA-seq expression and variant analysis
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline integrating STAR, RSEM, and GATK for analyzing gene expression and calling variants from RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ThreeDRNAseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for differential expression and alternative splicing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for differential expression (DE) and differential alternative splicing (DAS) analysis using RNA-seq data.

tools.name: CircAST
tools.one_line_profile: Circular RNA full-length assembly and quantification tool
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed for the full-length assembly and quantification of circular RNAs (circRNAs) using RNA-Seq data.

tools.name: GSFA
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse factor analysis for single-cell CRISPR screens
tools.detailed_description: An R package for simultaneous sparse factor analysis and differential gene expression discovery in single-cell CRISPR screening data.

tools.name: DislncRF
tools.one_line_profile: Inference of disease-associated lncRNAs from tissue expression
tools.detailed_description: A tool for inferring disease-associated long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) using tissue expression profiles.

tools.name: iDEA
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative Differential Expression and Analysis for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A framework for differential expression (DE) and gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) tailored for single-cell RNA-seq studies.

tools.name: DEqMS
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical method for quantitative proteomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for differential expression analysis in quantitative proteomics, improving estimation accuracy by modeling the dependence of variance on peptide count.

tools.name: normpy
tools.one_line_profile: Normalization methods for RNA-Seq expression data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various normalization methods for RNA-Seq expression data.

tools.name: ScanExitronLR
tools.one_line_profile: Characterization and quantification of exitron splicing in long-read RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A package for detecting and quantifying exitron splicing events specifically in long-read RNA-seq data.

tools.name: BrassicaEDB
tools.one_line_profile: Gene expression database and profiling platform for Brassica crops
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive interactive tool and database for gene expression profiling data in Brassica crops, enabling researchers to explore transcriptome levels.

tools.name: SPROD
tools.one_line_profile: Denoising tool for spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: SPROD (Spatial PROfiling De-noising) is a tool designed to correct drop-outs in spatial transcriptomics data by leveraging spatial information to improve gene expression profiling.

tools.name: VIRTUS
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral transcriptome detection and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed for the detection and quantification of viral transcriptomes, taking into account splicing events.

tools.name: VIRTUS2
tools.one_line_profile: Updated pipeline for viral transcriptome detection and quantification
tools.detailed_description: The second version of the VIRTUS pipeline for viral transcriptome detection and quantification, incorporating improvements in processing.

tools.name: squab
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-based gene expression quantification tool
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based tool for quantifying gene expression from alignment data, offering performance benefits for specific quantification tasks.

tools.name: PAQR_KAPAC
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for poly(A) site quantification and motif inference
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools (PAQR and KAPAC) from Zavolan Lab for quantifying poly(A) site usage from RNA-seq data and inferring regulatory sequence motifs implicated in 3' end processing.

tools.name: RNASkim
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid method for RNA-Seq quantification at transcript level
tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for fast RNA-Seq quantification, clustering transcripts to reduce the complexity of abundance estimation.

tools.name: ADesigner
tools.one_line_profile: One-shot antibody designer using Cross-Gate MLP and protein complex invariant embeddings
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of the AAAI'24 paper. It utilizes a Cross-Gate MLP architecture combined with protein complex invariant embeddings to perform one-shot design of antibody sequences, aiming to optimize binding affinity and specificity.

tools.name: GENA-LM
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer masked language model trained on human DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: GENA-LM is a suite of transformer-based masked language models trained on human DNA sequences (T2T-CHM13 and GRCh38). It is designed to learn rich genomic representations for downstream tasks such as promoter prediction, splice site identification, and chromatin profiling.

tools.name: progenomes_classifier
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to classify genomes into the specI taxonomy
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool designed to classify input genome sequences into the specI taxonomy framework. It aids in taxonomic profiling and identification of microbial genomes based on specific marker genes.

tools.name: iPPIGAN
tools.one_line_profile: De novo molecular design for PPI inhibitors using GANs
tools.detailed_description: A deep molecular generative model framework specifically designed for creating Protein-Protein Interaction (PPI) inhibitors. It utilizes Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to synthesize novel molecular structures optimized for targeting specific protein interfaces.

tools.name: Genos
tools.one_line_profile: A Genomic Foundation Model for sequence analysis
tools.detailed_description: A genomic foundation model developed by BGI-HangzhouAI. It is designed to learn representations of genomic sequences to support various downstream bioinformatics tasks, leveraging large-scale pre-training on genomic data.

tools.name: TMbed
tools.one_line_profile: Transmembrane protein prediction using language model embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting transmembrane proteins and their topology. It utilizes embeddings from protein language models (like ProtT5) to achieve high-accuracy predictions of transmembrane helices and signal peptides without requiring evolutionary profiles (MSAs).

tools.name: ProRNA3D-single
tools.one_line_profile: Single-sequence protein-RNA complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for predicting the 3D structure of protein-RNA complexes using only single sequences. It leverages biological language models to extract features from protein and RNA sequences for structure modeling.

tools.name: PST
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Structure Transformer for structure-aware embeddings
tools.detailed_description: Protein Structure Transformer (PST) is a model designed to endow pretrained protein language models with structural knowledge. It processes protein structures to generate embeddings that capture both sequence and structural information for downstream tasks.

tools.name: ERNIE-RNA
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-enhanced RNA language model
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained RNA language model that incorporates structural information to improve RNA representation learning. It is designed to handle various RNA-related tasks by leveraging both sequence and secondary structure data.

tools.name: protein-se3
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking SE3-based generative models for protein design
tools.detailed_description: A framework and benchmarking suite for SE(3)-equivariant generative models applied to protein structure design. It facilitates the evaluation and development of models that generate 3D protein backbones.

tools.name: PCMol
tools.one_line_profile: De novo molecular generator conditioned on protein embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A multi-target molecular generation tool that conditions generation on AlphaFold's latent protein embeddings. It aims to design small molecules that bind to specific protein targets defined by their structural embeddings.

tools.name: DeepGOA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for gene ontology annotation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for predicting Gene Ontology (GO) annotations. It integrates sequence information with protein-protein interaction network data to improve the accuracy of function prediction.

tools.name: RNALoc-LM
tools.one_line_profile: RNA language model for subcellular localization prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained RNA language model specifically fine-tuned for predicting the subcellular localization of RNA molecules. It leverages sequence patterns learned from large-scale RNA data to predict where RNAs reside within the cell.

tools.name: RNAErnie
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-aware RNA language model
tools.detailed_description: An RNA language model that incorporates motif-aware pre-training and type-guided fine-tuning. It is designed to capture both sequential and structural motif information for improved performance on various RNA analysis tasks.

tools.name: SETH
tools.one_line_profile: Protein disorder prediction using ProtT5 embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for residue-wise prediction of intrinsic disorder in proteins. It utilizes embeddings from the ProtT5 protein language model to predict disordered regions efficiently and accurately.

tools.name: DNABERT-Enhancer
tools.one_line_profile: Enhancer prediction using fine-tuned DNABERT
tools.detailed_description: A tool based on the DNABERT model, fine-tuned specifically for the prediction of genomic enhancer regions. It also includes a generative component for creating cumulative enhancer datasets.

tools.name: bio-transformers
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for ESM and ProtBERT protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a unified interface to access and use state-of-the-art protein language models like ESM and ProtBERT. It simplifies the process of generating embeddings and computing log-likelihoods for protein sequences.

tools.name: esm-s
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-Informed Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that integrates structural information into the training process. It aims to learn representations that reflect both the sequence and the 3D structure of proteins.

tools.name: species-aware-DNA-LM
tools.one_line_profile: Species-aware DNA language modeling
tools.detailed_description: A DNA language model architecture that explicitly accounts for species information during training. This approach allows the model to learn species-specific genomic patterns and improve generalization across different organisms.

tools.name: Progeni
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Knowledge Graph for Target Identification
tools.detailed_description: A computational framework that uses a probabilistic knowledge graph to identify potential drug targets. It integrates diverse biological data to infer relationships between genes, diseases, and drugs.

tools.name: InstructPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language model trained with structure instructions
tools.detailed_description: A large protein language model trained to follow structural instructions. It enables controllable protein generation and modification by conditioning the model on specific structural constraints or descriptions.

tools.name: R-ESM
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary Scale Modeling for RNA
tools.detailed_description: An adaptation of the Evolutionary Scale Modeling (ESM) architecture specifically for RNA sequences. It provides pre-trained embeddings for RNA that capture evolutionary and structural information.

tools.name: InterPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable features in Protein Language Models via Sparse Autoencoders
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for analyzing and interpreting the internal representations of protein language models. It uses sparse autoencoders to decompose embeddings into interpretable features, aiding in the understanding of what these models learn about protein biology.

tools.name: iDNA_ABF
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-scale deep learning model for DNA methylation prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting DNA methylation sites. It employs a multi-scale approach to capture features from DNA sequences, aiming for high accuracy and interpretability in epigenomic analysis.

tools.name: TinyDNABERT
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight genomic language model
tools.detailed_description: A compact version of the DNABERT model, designed for efficient genomic sequence analysis. It uses BPE tokenization and a RoBERTa architecture to provide genomic embeddings with lower computational resource requirements.

tools.name: Selene
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for training sequence-level deep learning networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based framework designed for developing, training, and evaluating deep learning models on biological sequences. It supports various data formats and provides tools for sequence-based prediction tasks.

tools.name: regLM
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for training hyenaDNA-based autoregressive language models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by Genentech for training autoregressive language models on DNA sequences, specifically leveraging the Hyena operator. It is designed for generating and analyzing genomic sequences.

tools.name: GENERanno
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic Foundation Model for Metagenomic Annotation
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model specifically tailored for the annotation of metagenomic data. It leverages large-scale pre-training to identify and annotate genes and functional elements in complex metagenomic samples.

tools.name: GENERator
tools.one_line_profile: Long-Context Generative Genomic Foundation Model
tools.detailed_description: A generative genomic foundation model capable of handling long-context sequences. It is designed for tasks requiring the generation or completion of long DNA sequences, facilitating applications in synthetic biology and genome design.

tools.name: HydraRNA
tools.one_line_profile: Full-length RNA language model
tools.detailed_description: A language model designed to process full-length RNA sequences. It aims to capture long-range dependencies and global structural features of RNA molecules for improved prediction and analysis.

tools.name: TamGent
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based generative solution for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model tailored for generating molecules that fit specific protein pockets, utilizing a Transformer architecture for structure-based drug design (SBDD).

tools.name: protein-localization
tools.one_line_profile: Protein subcellular localization prediction using Transformer embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging Transformer-based protein embeddings and linear attention mechanisms to predict the subcellular localization of proteins with state-of-the-art accuracy.

tools.name: HyenaDNA
tools.one_line_profile: Long-range genomic foundation model built with Hyena operator
tools.detailed_description: A genomic foundation model capable of handling long-range sequences (up to 1M tokens) using the Hyena operator, enabling high-resolution analysis of DNA sequences.

tools.name: ProtFlash
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight protein language model for efficient embedding
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight protein language model designed to generate effective protein representations with reduced computational cost compared to larger PLMs.

tools.name: Cryo-MEM
tools.one_line_profile: Membrane signal subtraction software for Cryo-EM reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A specialized software tool for subtracting membrane signals to facilitate high-resolution cryo-EM reconstruction of membrane proteins embedded in their native environment.

tools.name: ReLSO
tools.one_line_profile: Regularized Latent Space Optimization for generative protein design
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based neural network framework (Regularized Latent Space Optimization) for generating highly optimized protein sequences by exploring a regularized latent space.

tools.name: MAPE-PPI
tools.one_line_profile: Microenvironment-aware protein embedding for PPI prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting protein-protein interactions (PPI) by incorporating microenvironment-aware protein embeddings to enhance accuracy and efficiency.

tools.name: LucaPCycle
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-channel model for phosphate-solubilizing protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A predictive model utilizing raw sequences and protein language models to identify phosphate-solubilizing functionality and classify specific types among 31 fine-grained functions.

tools.name: LucaVirus
tools.one_line_profile: Unified genome-protein language model for virus analysis
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for modeling the evolutionary and functional landscape of viruses, integrating genomic and protein data for downstream viral analysis tasks.

tools.name: DNABERT-2
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient foundation model for multi-species genome analysis
tools.detailed_description: An efficient genomic foundation model trained on multi-species genomes, serving as a benchmark and tool for various downstream DNA sequence analysis tasks.

tools.name: DNABERT_S
tools.one_line_profile: Species-aware DNA embedding model
tools.detailed_description: A genomic foundation model variant focused on learning species-aware DNA embeddings to improve performance on cross-species or species-specific genomic tasks.

tools.name: GERM
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and low-cost genomic foundation model training via outlier removal
tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for training genomic foundation models more efficiently by identifying and removing outliers, reducing computational costs while maintaining performance.

tools.name: GenoArmory
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for adversarial attacks on genomic foundation models
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework designed to evaluate the robustness of genomic foundation models against adversarial attacks, ensuring security and reliability in genomic analysis.

tools.name: BioNeMo Binder Design Blueprint
tools.one_line_profile: Generative protein binder design workflow using NVIDIA BioNeMo
tools.detailed_description: A blueprint and workflow for designing protein binders using generative AI models within the NVIDIA BioNeMo framework, facilitating computational protein engineering.

tools.name: CodonFM
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-resolution language models for protein-coding sequences
tools.detailed_description: A family of language models trained on codon sequences from millions of protein-coding genes, enabling high-resolution analysis of coding regions across species.

tools.name: PoET-2
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval-augmented multimodal protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that uses retrieval-augmented generation to improve protein sequence generation and representation learning.

tools.name: ProLLaMA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Large Language Model for multi-task processing
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model adapted for protein sequences, capable of performing multiple protein language processing tasks such as generation and property prediction.

tools.name: PaccMann Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Generative models for transcriptomic/protein-driven molecular design
tools.detailed_description: Part of the PaccMann framework, this tool provides generative models for designing molecules based on transcriptomic or protein context, utilizing reinforcement learning.

tools.name: PaccMann Proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language modeling tools for the PaccMann framework
tools.detailed_description: A component of the PaccMann ecosystem focused on protein language modeling, providing embeddings and representations for downstream drug sensitivity prediction tasks.

tools.name: ProGen3
tools.one_line_profile: Family of protein language models for sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: The third generation of ProGen models, designed for controllable protein sequence generation and design, offering improved performance and capabilities.

tools.name: ProseLM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned protein language model for design
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model adapted for structure-conditioned design, allowing for the generation of sequences that fit specific structural constraints.

tools.name: EAT
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding-based annotation transfer for proteins
tools.detailed_description: EAT uses Euclidean distance between vector representations (embeddings) of proteins to transfer annotations from a set of labeled lookup protein embeddings to query protein embedding.

tools.name: VESPA
tools.one_line_profile: Single Amino Acid Variant effect predictor using ProtT5
tools.detailed_description: VESPA is a simple, yet powerful Single Amino Acid Variant (SAV) effect predictor based on embeddings of the Protein Language Model ProtT5.

tools.name: CPAC
tools.one_line_profile: Compound-Protein Affinity and Contact Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Cross-Modality and Self-Supervised Protein Embedding for Compound-Protein Affinity and Contact Prediction.

tools.name: TALE
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein function annotation
tools.detailed_description: Transformer-based protein function Annotation with joint feature-Label Embedding.

tools.name: PreMode
tools.one_line_profile: Mode-of-action prediction for missense variants
tools.detailed_description: PreMode predicts mode-of-action of missense variants by deep graph representation learning of protein sequence and structural context.

tools.name: SeqDance
tools.one_line_profile: Biophysics-informed protein language models
tools.detailed_description: Code for SeqDance/ESMDance, biophysics-informed protein language models for sequence analysis.

tools.name: ProteinLM
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained protein language models by THUDM
tools.detailed_description: Protein Language Model implementation and pre-trained weights from Tsinghua University (THUDM).

tools.name: Geometricus
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based, alignment-free embedding approach for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A structure-based, alignment-free embedding approach for proteins. Can be used as input to machine learning algorithms.

tools.name: SGGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal representation learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Multi-Modal Representation Learning for Molecular Property Prediction: Sequence, Graph, Geometry'.

tools.name: OpenBioSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for bio-sequence representation learning
tools.detailed_description: Focuses on supervised and self-supervised bio-sequence representation learning, developed by Westlake-AI.

tools.name: DeepGS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for drug-target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepGS: Deep Representation Learning of Graphs and Sequences for Drug-Target Binding Affinity Prediction.

tools.name: DeepCellSeek
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Models for Single-Cell RNA-Seq Annotation
tools.detailed_description: Large Language Models for Single-Cell RNA-Seq Annotation.

tools.name: seqdesign-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Protein design and variant prediction using autoregressive models
tools.detailed_description: Protein design and variant prediction using autoregressive generative models.

tools.name: Ankh
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: Ankh: Optimized Protein Language Model for efficient protein sequence representation.

tools.name: ProtTrans
tools.one_line_profile: State of the art pretrained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: ProtTrans is providing state of the art pretrained language models for proteins (ProtBert, ProtT5, etc.).

tools.name: ProSST
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid language model for directed protein evolution
tools.detailed_description: Advanced hybrid language model for directed protein evolution (NeurIPS 2024).

tools.name: VenusPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile Embedding Network for Understanding protein Sequences
tools.detailed_description: Versatile Embedding Network for Understanding protein Sequences.

tools.name: CPCProt
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter-efficient contrastive embeddings for proteins
tools.detailed_description: Parameter-efficient embeddings for proteins, pretrained using a contrastive loss.

tools.name: cheap-proteins
tools.one_line_profile: Joint embedding of protein sequence and structure
tools.detailed_description: Joint embedding of protein sequence and structure with discrete and continuous compressions of protein folding model latent spaces.

tools.name: SPROF-GO
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-based protein function prediction using pretrained language models
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate tool for predicting protein Gene Ontology (GO) functions directly from sequence data. It leverages a pretrained protein language model combined with homology-based label diffusion to improve prediction performance.

tools.name: efficient-evolution
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient evolutionary analysis and design using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for performing efficient evolutionary inference and protein design tasks using protein language models. It enables the exploration of the fitness landscape and generation of evolved sequences.

tools.name: Evolocity
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary velocity inference with protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating 'evolutionary velocity' of proteins using language models, allowing researchers to visualize and analyze the directionality of protein evolution in sequence space.

tools.name: DPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Protein Language Models for protein generation
tools.detailed_description: A family of diffusion-based protein language models designed for generative protein design tasks. It combines diffusion processes with language modeling to generate high-quality protein sequences.

tools.name: GEMS
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-ligand binding affinity prediction using PLMs and GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A predictive model for estimating protein-ligand binding affinity. It utilizes transfer learning from protein language models (PLMs) and Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to capture sequence and structural information.

tools.name: Frame2seq
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned masked language modeling for protein design
tools.detailed_description: A tool for inverse protein folding (sequence design) that uses structure-conditioned masked language modeling. It generates protein sequences that are likely to fold into a given backbone structure.

tools.name: DeepNano
tools.one_line_profile: Nanobody-antigen interaction prediction with ensemble deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting interactions between nanobodies and antigens. It employs ensemble learning and prompt-based protein language models to achieve high accuracy in interaction prediction.

tools.name: SeqDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Autoregressive generative models for protein design and variant prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library for training and using autoregressive generative models on biological sequences. It is designed for tasks such as predicting the effects of variants and generating novel protein sequences.

tools.name: SPACE
tools.one_line_profile: Protein embedding generation using STRING interaction data
tools.detailed_description: A method for generating protein embeddings that incorporate protein-protein interaction network information from STRING, serving as complementary features to sequence-based embeddings.

tools.name: S-PLM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware Protein Language Model via contrastive learning
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that integrates structural information through contrastive learning between sequence and structure representations, enhancing performance on structure-dependent downstream tasks.

tools.name: Evo
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic-scale biological foundation model
tools.detailed_description: A long-context biological foundation model capable of generating and analyzing sequences at the genome scale. It supports tasks ranging from molecular prediction to whole-genome generation.

tools.name: ESM
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary Scale Modeling: Pretrained protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of state-of-the-art transformer protein language models (ESM-1b, ESM-2, ESMFold) developed by Meta AI. It provides embeddings for downstream tasks and enables high-accuracy structure prediction directly from sequence.

tools.name: BEND
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for DNA Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for evaluating DNA language models on biologically meaningful tasks, such as gene finding, enhancer prediction, and chromatin accessibility.

tools.name: SpeciesLM
tools.one_line_profile: Species-aware DNA language models for regulatory element analysis
tools.detailed_description: A DNA language model that explicitly accounts for species information to better capture regulatory elements and their evolutionary conservation across different genomes.

tools.name: Chroma
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for programmable protein design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that enables programmable design of proteins with specific geometric and functional properties. It allows for conditioning on various constraints to generate novel protein backbones and sequences.

tools.name: METL
tools.one_line_profile: Mutational Effect Transfer Learning for protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for pretraining and finetuning biophysics-informed protein language models. It focuses on predicting mutational effects by transferring knowledge from large-scale sequence data to specific biophysical tasks.

tools.name: DeepVariant
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based variant caller for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline that uses a deep neural network to call genetic variants from next-generation DNA sequencing data. It treats variant calling as an image classification problem using pileup images.

tools.name: Progres
tools.one_line_profile: Fast protein structure searching tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapidly searching protein structure databases. It utilizes structural embeddings or representations to perform fast similarity searches, enabling efficient exploration of the protein structure universe.

tools.name: Helical
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for bio foundation models on genomics and transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework for accessing and utilizing state-of-the-art pre-trained biological foundation models, specifically focusing on genomics and transcriptomics modalities.

tools.name: ProGen2-finetuning
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for finetuning ProGen2 protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A specialized toolkit for finetuning the ProGen2 protein language model on specific protein families. It facilitates the generation of protein sequences tailored to specific functional or structural classes.

tools.name: TemStaPro
tools.one_line_profile: Protein thermostability prediction using PLM embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for predicting the thermostability of proteins based on their sequence. It uses representations from protein language models to classify proteins into thermostability categories.

tools.name: Nucleotide Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation models for genomics and transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A suite of large-scale pretrained language models for nucleotide sequences. These models are designed to predict molecular phenotypes and can be finetuned for various genomic and transcriptomic tasks.

tools.name: DNABERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers for DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for DNA sequences that captures global and local context information, enabling downstream tasks like promoter prediction and splice site identification.

tools.name: Graph Protein Design
tools.one_line_profile: Generative models for graph-based protein design
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for structure-based protein design using graph neural networks to predict sequences from backbone structures.

tools.name: quarto-molstar
tools.one_line_profile: Quarto extension to embed Mol* protein visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Quarto scientific publishing system that allows embedding interactive 3D protein structures and trajectories using Mol*.

tools.name: Distillation-DNABERT-Promoter
tools.one_line_profile: Distilled DNABERT models for efficient promoter identification
tools.detailed_description: Applies knowledge distillation techniques (DistilBERT, MiniLM) to DNABERT to create lightweight models specifically for identifying promoter regions in DNA.

tools.name: pLM-BLAST
tools.one_line_profile: Remote homology detection using protein language model embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool that replaces sequence alignment with embedding comparison (using pLMs like ProtT5) to detect remote homology between proteins that sequence-based BLAST might miss.

tools.name: ProteinDiffusionGenerator
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based generative model for protein design
tools.detailed_description: A generative framework using diffusion models to design novel protein sequences and structures, developed by the Buehler Lab at MIT.

tools.name: RiNALMo
tools.one_line_profile: General-purpose RNA language model
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained RNA language model capable of extracting embeddings for downstream RNA analysis tasks, trained on non-coding RNA sequences.

tools.name: PLM-interact
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-protein interaction prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: A framework that extends protein language models to predict protein-protein interactions (PPI) by leveraging pre-trained embeddings.

tools.name: progen-jax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX implementation of ProGen for protein generation
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance JAX implementation of the ProGen language model for conditional protein sequence generation.

tools.name: esmdiff
tools.one_line_profile: Structure language models for protein conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: A generative model framework that treats protein structure generation as a language modeling problem, enabling conformation sampling.

tools.name: ConFit
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive fitness learning for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein fitness landscapes using contrastive learning to reprogram protein language models, effective even with low-N data.

tools.name: DiffAb
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based generative model for antibody design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model specifically designed for antigen-specific antibody design and optimization using diffusion processes on protein structures.

tools.name: EndoFM-LV
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for endoscopy video analysis
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model designed for long-sequence representation learning in endoscopy videos, aiding in medical diagnostics.

tools.name: ProstT5
tools.one_line_profile: Bilingual language model for protein sequence and structure
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model capable of translating between sequence (amino acids) and structure (3Di states), enabling inverse folding and structure prediction tasks.

tools.name: SeqVec
tools.one_line_profile: Embeddings for protein sequences using ELMo
tools.detailed_description: One of the pioneering tools for generating continuous vector representations (embeddings) of protein sequences using deep learning (ELMo-based).

tools.name: peft_proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (LoRA) for protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A library and set of examples for applying Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) to fine-tune large protein language models efficiently on downstream tasks.

tools.name: RhoFold
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based RNA 3D structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end deep learning tool for predicting the 3D structure of RNA molecules from sequence, utilizing language models.

tools.name: USPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Universal signal peptide predictor
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting signal peptides across different organisms with high sensitivity, leveraging protein language models.

tools.name: PLM_SWE
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal transport aggregation for protein embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for aggregating residue-level protein language model embeddings into fixed-size protein representations using Sliced Wasserstein Embedding.

tools.name: CaLM
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-aware Language Model for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model trained on coding DNA sequences (CDS) to capture codon usage bias and synonymous mutation effects.

tools.name: esm2quinox
tools.one_line_profile: JAX/Equinox implementation of the ESM2 protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A port of Meta AI's ESM2 protein language model to the JAX ecosystem using Equinox, enabling efficient training and inference on TPU/GPU hardware.

tools.name: FAPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient PyTorch implementation of Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A drop-in efficient implementation for Protein Language Models (PLMs) in PyTorch, optimized for speed and memory usage during training and inference.

tools.name: PanSpace
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding-based indexing for bacterial pan-genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for compact storage and rapid querying of bacterial pan-genomes using embedding-based indexing techniques.

tools.name: CITRIS
tools.one_line_profile: Causal Identifiability from Temporal Intervened Sequences
tools.detailed_description: A library for causal representation learning and causal discovery from temporal sequences with interventions, applicable to scientific causal inference tasks.

tools.name: Lobster
tools.one_line_profile: Language models for Biological Sequence Transformation
tools.detailed_description: A library and model suite for biological sequence transformation and evolutionary representation learning using language models.

tools.name: Merizo Search
tools.one_line_profile: Fast protein domain structure embedding and search tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating protein domain structure embeddings and performing fast search operations to identify structural homologs.

tools.name: Vesicle Picker
tools.one_line_profile: Automated identification of vesicle-embedded membrane proteins in cryo-EM
tools.detailed_description: A program interfacing Segment Anything Model (SAM) with cryoSPARC to efficiently identify vesicle-embedded membrane proteins and complexes in cryo-EM micrographs.

tools.name: GenSLMs
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-scale language models for SARS-CoV-2 evolution
tools.detailed_description: Genome-scale language models designed to analyze and predict evolutionary dynamics of SARS-CoV-2 and other viral genomes.

tools.name: Mistral-DNA
tools.one_line_profile: Large language model specialized for DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: An adaptation of the Mistral large language model architecture specifically trained for DNA sequence analysis and generation.

tools.name: AbMap
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language model customized for antibodies
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model specifically fine-tuned and customized for antibody sequence analysis and representation learning.

tools.name: Bio Embeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for generating protein embeddings from sequences
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline and library to generate, visualize, and analyze protein embeddings from various state-of-the-art protein language models.

tools.name: PROGENY
tools.one_line_profile: Pathway RespOnsive GENe activity inference
tools.detailed_description: An R package to infer pathway activity from gene expression data using a linear model based on perturbation experiments.

tools.name: PROGENY-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of PROGENY pathway inference
tools.detailed_description: The Python implementation of the PROGENY method for inferring pathway activity from gene expression data.

tools.name: ProGen
tools.one_line_profile: Protein generation language models
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of ProGen, a controllable protein language model for generating protein sequences with desired properties.

tools.name: ProVis
tools.one_line_profile: Interpreting attention in Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: Tools for analyzing and visualizing the attention mechanisms of protein language models to understand captured biological features (BERTology for Biology).

tools.name: ConPLex
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction prediction using contrastive learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting drug-target interactions with high accuracy by adapting protein language models and using contrastive learning.

tools.name: TAPE
tools.one_line_profile: Tasks Assessing Protein Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A framework and benchmark suite for evaluating protein embeddings across multiple biologically relevant semi-supervised learning tasks.

tools.name: Prose
tools.one_line_profile: Protein sequence embedding models
tools.detailed_description: Multi-task and masked language model-based protein sequence embedding models for various downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: NetSolP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein solubility prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool that predicts the solubility and usability for purification of proteins expressed in E. coli using protein language models.

tools.name: RNABenchmark (BEACON)
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Comprehensive RNA Tasks and Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite (BEACON) for evaluating RNA language models across various RNA-specific tasks.

tools.name: ProtSpace
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for protein embedding spaces
tools.detailed_description: A program designed to help visualize and investigate protein embedding spaces generated by various models.

tools.name: Protein-Vec
tools.one_line_profile: Protein embedding mixture of experts model
tools.detailed_description: A protein embedding model utilizing a mixture of experts architecture to capture diverse protein features.

tools.name: CATHe
tools.one_line_profile: Remote homologue detection for CATH superfamilies
tools.detailed_description: A Deep Learning tool trained on protein sequence embeddings to accurately detect remote homologues for CATH superfamilies.

tools.name: mlx-esm-2
tools.one_line_profile: MLX implementation of ESM-2 protein language model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the ESM-2 protein language model using the MLX framework, optimized for Apple Silicon hardware.

tools.name: Evolla (ProteinChat)
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-language generative model for decoding molecular language
tools.detailed_description: A frontier protein-language generative model designed to decode the molecular language of proteins, enabling chat-like interaction with protein data.

tools.name: ProTrek
tools.one_line_profile: Trimodal Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: A trimodal protein language model that integrates sequence, structure, and text to illuminate the protein universe.

tools.name: SaProt
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that incorporates a structural alphabet (AA+3Di) to enhance sequence representations with structural information.

tools.name: SaprotHub
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for accessible Protein Language Modeling
tools.detailed_description: A platform and toolkit designed to make protein language modeling accessible to biologists, facilitating easy use of models like SaProt.

tools.name: ProteinCLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for protein and natural language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing contrastive learning to harmonize protein language models with natural language models for multi-modal tasks.

tools.name: TS-DAR
tools.one_line_profile: Transition state identification from molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: TS-DAR identifies transition states of protein conformational changes from MD simulations using hyperspherical embeddings in the latent space.

tools.name: gLM
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic language model for protein co-regulation prediction
tools.detailed_description: A genomic language model that predicts protein co-regulation and function by learning from raw genomic sequences.

tools.name: ULDNA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-DNA binding site predictor using PLMs
tools.detailed_description: ULDNA is a protein-DNA binding site predictor that integrates protein language models with an LSTM-attention network.

tools.name: RNA-MSM
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised RNA language model for structure and function tasks
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised RNA language model based on multiple sequence alignments that outputs embeddings and attention maps for downstream RNA tasks.

tools.name: DeepChopper
tools.one_line_profile: Chimeric read detection for NanoPore direct-RNA sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A tool using language models to identify chimeric artificial reads in NanoPore direct-RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: DNALLM
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for DNA Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for developing and applying DNA large language models for genomic analysis.

tools.name: Plant_DNA_LLMs
tools.one_line_profile: Tailored DNA LLMs for plant genome analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tailored DNA large language models (PDLLMs) specifically designed for analyzing plant genomes.

tools.name: R-Predictor
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating plant disease resistance genes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for annotating plant disease resistance genes utilizing deep protein language models and machine learning classifiers.

tools.name: LAMAR
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for RNA multilayer regulation
tools.detailed_description: A foundation language model designed to analyze and predict multilayer regulation mechanisms of RNA.

tools.name: Mol-Instructions
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale biomolecular instruction dataset for LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale biomolecular instruction dataset designed to improve Large Language Models' performance on biomolecular tasks.

tools.name: OntoProtein
tools.one_line_profile: Protein pretraining model with Gene Ontology embedding
tools.detailed_description: A protein pretraining framework that incorporates Gene Ontology (GO) embeddings to enhance protein representation learning.

tools.name: Tibanna
tools.one_line_profile: AWS cloud execution manager for genomic pipelines (CWL/WDL/Snakemake)
tools.detailed_description: Tibanna is a software tool designed to execute genomic pipelines on Amazon Web Services (AWS). It supports major scientific workflow languages including CWL, WDL, and Snakemake, managing cloud infrastructure provisioning and job execution for high-throughput data analysis.

tools.name: EnsembleVariantCallingPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble variant calling pipeline integrating Mutect2, Strelka2, Varscan2, and MuSE
tools.detailed_description: A genomic analysis pipeline that performs Single Nucleotide Variant (SNV) and Indel calling using an ensemble of four variant callers (Mutect2, Strelka2, Varscan2, MuSE). It processes FASTQ or BAM files to improve variant detection accuracy through consensus strategies.

tools.name: Post-QC
tools.one_line_profile: Post-variant calling quality control and phasing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed for post-processing variant calls. It performs quality control steps to orient cohort data with reference files and includes modules for merging datasets and phasing variants against a reference panel.

tools.name: toil-rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable RNA-seq analysis pipeline built on Toil
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-sequencing analysis pipeline developed by the UC Santa Cruz Computational Genomics Lab. It utilizes the Toil workflow engine to provide scalable, cross-platform execution of RNA-seq processing steps including alignment and quantification.

tools.name: toil-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Toil-based workflows for genomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository of genomic workflows implemented using the Toil workflow engine. It contains scripts for various common bioinformatics tasks, enabling reproducible and scalable analysis on different computing environments.

tools.name: iskylims
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) for NGS
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Laboratory Information Management System specifically designed for Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) facilities. It manages sample tracking, statistics, reporting, and bioinformatics analysis service workflows.

tools.name: cwl-airflow
tools.one_line_profile: Extension to run CWL workflows on Apache Airflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that extends Apache Airflow to support Common Workflow Language (CWL) v1.1. It allows scientists to execute portable CWL workflows using Airflow's scheduling and monitoring capabilities.

tools.name: LUSH-DNASeq-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance DNA-Seq variant calling workflow
tools.detailed_description: A DNA sequencing analysis workflow designed for accuracy and speed. It utilizes the LUSH toolkit to perform variant calling on genomic data, optimized for high-throughput sequencing applications.

tools.name: cromwell-frontend
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface for the Cromwell workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A web-based management interface for the Cromwell job server. It provides authentication and workflow definition management, enabling users to monitor and control scientific workflows running on Cromwell.

tools.name: Mulled
tools.one_line_profile: Automated container generation system for bioinformatics software
tools.detailed_description: A tool within the BioContainers ecosystem for automatically generating containerized versions (Docker/Singularity) of scientific software. It facilitates reproducibility by creating minimal, versioned containers for bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: CWL_HTS_pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: CWL workflows for High-Throughput Sequencing analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows and wrappers for processing High-Throughput Sequencing (HTS) data. It includes pipelines for RNA-Seq, ChIP-Seq, and Germline Variant calling.

tools.name: TCGAWorkflow
tools.one_line_profile: Bioconductor-based workflow for TCGA cancer data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive workflow for analyzing cancer genomics and epigenomics data from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA). It leverages Bioconductor packages to provide an end-to-end analysis path for complex cancer datasets.

tools.name: CaPTk
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer Imaging Phenomics Toolkit for medical image analysis
tools.detailed_description: The Cancer Imaging Phenomics Toolkit (CaPTk) is a software platform for medical image analysis and predictive modeling. It integrates advanced algorithms for segmentation, feature extraction, and machine learning to support cancer research and radiomics.

tools.name: CDPHE-SARS-CoV-2
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for SARS-CoV-2 genome assembly and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of bioinformatics workflows and scripts developed by the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment for the assembly and analysis of SARS-CoV-2 whole genome tiled amplicon sequencing data.

tools.name: CalliNGS-NF
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for GATK RNA-Seq variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the GATK Best Practices for variant calling from RNA-Seq data. It automates the process of read alignment, processing, and variant discovery using GATK tools.

tools.name: CebolaLab RNA-seq
tools.one_line_profile: Step-by-step RNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A structured analysis pipeline for RNA-sequencing data, providing scripts and steps for processing raw reads into expression quantification and downstream analysis.

tools.name: ClarityNLP
tools.one_line_profile: NLP framework for clinical phenotyping and data extraction
tools.detailed_description: A Natural Language Processing (NLP) framework designed for extracting clinical phenotypes from medical notes. It supports OMOP data models and provides tools for query construction and document processing in a healthcare context.

tools.name: Consonance
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud infrastructure provisioner for scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A utility for scheduling, reporting on, and provisioning Virtual Machines (VMs) for scientific workflows. It is often used in conjunction with workflow managers to handle cloud resource allocation.

tools.name: wdl-ci
tools.one_line_profile: CI/CD tools for validating WDL workflows
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools designed to validate and test Workflow Description Language (WDL) repositories. It is intended for use in Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to ensure the reliability of scientific workflows.

tools.name: analysis_pipeline_WDL
tools.one_line_profile: WDL workflows for TOPMed GWAS analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of WDL workflows implementing the University of Washington TOPMed DCC Best Practices for Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS). It provides reproducible pipelines for large-scale genomic analysis.

tools.name: Toil
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable workflow engine for CWL, WDL, and Python pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A scalable, efficient, and cross-platform workflow engine that supports Common Workflow Language (CWL), Workflow Description Language (WDL), and Python-defined workflows. It enables the execution of complex scientific pipelines on various environments from local machines to the cloud.

tools.name: fold_tree
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for phylogenetic tree construction
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline designed to create phylogenetic trees from sets of sequences. It automates the steps of sequence alignment and tree inference, facilitating reproducible phylogenomic analysis.

tools.name: GGR-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: CWL tools and workflows for Genomics of Gene Regulation
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing Common Workflow Language (CWL) tool definitions and workflows specifically for the Genomics of Gene Regulation (GGR) project. It enables reproducible analysis of gene regulation data.

tools.name: Calrissian
tools.one_line_profile: CWL workflow runner for Kubernetes
tools.detailed_description: A CWL runner designed to execute workflows on Kubernetes clusters. It provides a scalable way to run Common Workflow Language pipelines in containerized environments.

tools.name: ebi-metagenomics-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: CWL implementation of the EBI Metagenomics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: The Common Workflow Language (CWL) description of the analysis pipeline used by EBI Metagenomics. It allows users to reproduce the standard EBI metagenomic analysis locally or on other infrastructure.

tools.name: VIRify
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detection of phages and eukaryotic viruses from metagenomic assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect phages and eukaryotic viruses from metagenomic and metatranscriptomic assemblies, utilizing a curated database of viral HMMs.

tools.name: MGnify Pipeline v5.0
tools.one_line_profile: CWL descriptions of the MGnify metagenomics analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: The official Common Workflow Language (CWL) definitions for version 5.0 of the MGnify pipeline, used for the analysis of microbiome data.

tools.name: ENCORE
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for enhancing computational reproducibility in bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A framework or toolset designed to facilitate and enhance the computational reproducibility of bioinformatics analyses.

tools.name: Mikado
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight pipeline for identifying expressed loci from RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Python pipeline that facilitates the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data and selects the best gene models in each locus, integrating data from multiple transcript assemblers.

tools.name: Caper
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for Cromwell workflow manager
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper tool for the Cromwell workflow engine, designed to simplify the running of WDL workflows in various environments including cloud and HPC.

tools.name: Croo
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell output organizer
tools.detailed_description: A utility to organize outputs from Cromwell workflow executions, making it easier to manage and interpret results from complex pipelines.

tools.name: ENCODE Long Read RNA Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: WDL pipeline for processing long-read RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: The official ENCODE pipeline for analyzing long-read RNA sequencing data, implemented in WDL.

tools.name: ENCODE Long RNA-Seq Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: STAR-based pipeline for processing long RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: The ENCODE consortium's standard processing pipeline for long RNA-Seq data, utilizing STAR for alignment.

tools.name: ESR Human Genomics Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for human WGS/WES data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to process single samples or cohorts of Illumina paired-end sequencing data (WGS or WES) using standard tools like GATK4 and BWA.

tools.name: EdinburghGenomics Analysis Driver
tools.one_line_profile: Pipelines for Illumina sequencing QC and variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A set of pipelines used by Edinburgh Genomics for demultiplexing, sequence quality control, and variant calling on Illumina HiSeqX data.

tools.name: pytest-wdl
tools.one_line_profile: Pytest plugin for testing WDL workflows
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the pytest framework that enables testing of Workflow Description Language (WDL) scripts, facilitating test-driven development of bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: precisionFDA
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud platform for benchmarking NGS analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A cloud-based platform by the FDA that provides an environment for the community to test, pilot, and benchmark new approaches to validating next-generation sequencing (NGS) analysis pipelines.

tools.name: FINNGEN regenie-pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: WDL pipelines for running Regenie analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of WDL pipelines designed to run Regenie, a tool for whole-genome regression modelling of large-scale genetic data.

tools.name: MAG Snakemake Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for recovery of prokaryotic genomes from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for the recovery of prokaryotic genomes (Metagenome-Assembled Genomes, MAGs) from shotgun metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: Redundans
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly of heterozygous/polymorphic genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to assist in the assembly of heterozygous or polymorphic genomes by reducing redundancy and scaffolding.

tools.name: GalSim
tools.one_line_profile: Modular galaxy image simulation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A modular toolkit for simulating images of galaxies, used primarily for testing and calibrating astronomical measurement algorithms.

tools.name: MARS
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized approach to bioinformatics tool integration
tools.detailed_description: A framework for simplifying bioinformatics workflows through a containerized approach to tool integration and management.

tools.name: Eoulsan
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline and framework for NGS analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline and framework dedicated to High Throughput Sequencing (HTS) data analysis, supporting RNA-seq and scRNA-seq workflows.

tools.name: sv-callers
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for detecting structural variants
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow designed for the detection of structural variants in genomic data using multiple calling tools.

tools.name: SVsim
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Structural Variant generator for benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates synthetic Structural Variant calls to serve as benchmarks for testing and evaluating SV calling pipelines.

tools.name: Longbow
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for automating biosimulations on remote HPC
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to automate the submission and management of biomolecular simulations on remote High Performance Computing (HPC) resources.

tools.name: CLARITE
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for quality control and analysis of traits and exposures
tools.detailed_description: CLeaning to Analysis: Reproducibility-based Interface for Traits and Exposures. A Python package for cleaning and analyzing data from large-scale studies.

tools.name: sci-RNA-seq3 Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Processing pipeline for sci-RNA-seq3 data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and pipelines for processing data from the sci-RNA-seq3 single-cell sequencing protocol.

tools.name: pytest-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Test framework for bioinformatics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool to configure and run tests for workflows and pipelines using YAML configuration files, widely used in bioinformatics for ensuring pipeline reproducibility.

tools.name: ONT Assembly Snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for bacterial genome assembly using ONT data
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the assembly and polishing of bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data.

tools.name: LuigiNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow system for Natural Language Processing
tools.detailed_description: A workflow system built on top of Luigi, specifically tailored for Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks and pipelines.

tools.name: Colora
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for de novo genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for de novo genome assembly that produces chromosome-scale primary/phased assemblies and includes organelle assembly.

tools.name: GenoMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent framework for automated scientific analysis workflows
tools.detailed_description: A minimalist multi-agent framework designed for the robust automation of scientific analysis workflows, specifically demonstrating capabilities in gene expression analysis.

tools.name: scPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for single cell RNA-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A preprocessing pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data that handles raw reads to gene count matrices, including quality control and report generation.

tools.name: AWE
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow and resource management system for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: AWE (Analysis Workflow Engine) is a workload management system for bioinformatics data analysis, designed to manage scalable and reproducible workflows.

tools.name: Playbook-Workflow-Builder
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow builder for bioinformatics playbooks
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by MaayanLab to construct and manage bioinformatics workflows, facilitating the creation of reproducible analysis playbooks.

tools.name: biojupies
tools.one_line_profile: Automated generation of bioinformatics Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool that automatically generates tailored Jupyter Notebooks for bioinformatics analysis, enabling reproducible research and easy visualization.

tools.name: motrpac-rna-seq-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonized RNA-seq pipeline for MoTrPAC project
tools.detailed_description: A WDL-based RNA-seq data analysis pipeline developed for the Molecular Transducers of Physical Activity Consortium (MoTrPAC) to ensure harmonized data processing.

tools.name: bgcflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for biosynthetic gene cluster analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the systematic analysis of biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) across large collections of genomes (pangenomes).

tools.name: GenErode
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genome erosion analysis in historical samples
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for analyzing whole-genome sequencing data from historical and modern samples to study patterns of genome erosion.

tools.name: aMeta
tools.one_line_profile: Ancient microbiome analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow specifically designed for the analysis of ancient microbiome data, handling the specific characteristics of ancient DNA.

tools.name: ContainerInception
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for reproducible bioinformatics environments
tools.detailed_description: Gerber (Generalized Easy Reproducible Bioinformatics Environment wRapper) is a tool to facilitate the creation and usage of reproducible containerized environments for bioinformatics.

tools.name: gdc-dnaseq-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: GDC DNASeq analysis workflow in CWL
tools.detailed_description: The Common Workflow Language (CWL) implementation of the DNA-Seq analysis pipelines used by the NCI Genomic Data Commons (GDC).

tools.name: scriptcwl
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to create CWL workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that allows users to create Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows by writing simple Python scripts.

tools.name: Soft-Agar-Colony-Counter
tools.one_line_profile: Automated colony counting tool for soft agar assays
tools.detailed_description: A browser-based tool for hybrid automated/manual counting of colonies in soft agar colony formation assays, featuring live threshold tuning.

tools.name: seurigiotto-benchmark-framework
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Spatial Transcriptomics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for reproducible benchmarking of Spatial Transcriptomics (ST) data analysis pipelines, specifically comparing Seurat and Giotto.

tools.name: JAFFA
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for gene fusion detection
tools.detailed_description: A multi-step bioinformatics pipeline that detects gene fusions from RNA-Seq data, capable of using raw reads or pre-assembled transcripts.

tools.name: pgsc_calc
tools.one_line_profile: Polygenic Score Catalog Calculator pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed by the Polygenic Score Catalog to calculate polygenic scores (PGS) for input genomic data.

tools.name: janis
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate type-safe CWL and WDL workflows
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python tool that allows for the machine generation of type-safe Common Workflow Language (CWL) and Workflow Description Language (WDL) workflows.

tools.name: HiFi-16S-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for PacBio HiFi 16S analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline specifically designed to analyze PacBio HiFi full-length 16S rRNA sequencing data for microbiome studies.

tools.name: HiFi-somatic-WDL
tools.one_line_profile: Tumor-normal variant calling workflow for HiFi reads
tools.detailed_description: A WDL workflow for performing tumor-normal variant calling using PacBio HiFi reads, optimized for somatic mutation detection.

tools.name: BENGAL
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for cross-species scRNA-seq integration
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the integration and assessment of single-cell RNA-seq datasets across different species.

tools.name: bionix
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible bioinformatics pipelines using Nix
tools.detailed_description: A framework for building functional and highly reproducible bioinformatics pipelines using the Nix package manager.

tools.name: pypsa-eur
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization model of the European energy system
tools.detailed_description: A sector-coupled open optimization model of the European energy system, used for scientific modeling and planning of energy infrastructure.

tools.name: VesselExpress
tools.one_line_profile: Automated blood vasculature analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated analysis of blood vasculature in 3D light-sheet image volumes, facilitating bioimage quantification.

tools.name: ro-crate-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Research Object Crate (RO-Crate)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to create and consume RO-Crates, a community standard for packaging research data and metadata to ensure reproducibility.

tools.name: Capsule
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducibility framework for R and bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework designed to ensure the reproducibility of R-based bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: qmflows
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for constructing and executing efficient computational chemistry workflows, managing quantum mechanical calculations.

tools.name: Sentieon-WDL
tools.one_line_profile: WDL pipelines for Sentieon genomics tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Workflow Description Language (WDL) scripts for running Sentieon's genomics analysis tools. These pipelines facilitate high-performance variant calling and data processing compatible with Cromwell and other WDL executors.

tools.name: Variants2Neoantigen
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for neoantigen calling from variant records
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline that predicts tumor neoantigens starting from variant record files (MAF). It is designed to assist in immunogenomics research by identifying potential targets for cancer immunotherapy.

tools.name: ilus
tools.one_line_profile: WGS/WES variant calling pipeline generator using GATK and Sentieon
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight pipeline generator for Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) and Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data analysis. It integrates GATK and Sentieon tools to create efficient variant calling workflows.

tools.name: SingleRust
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance single-cell analysis tool written in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A single-cell analysis toolkit leveraging Rust's concurrency features to provide scalable and high-throughput processing pipelines for single-cell genomics data.

tools.name: Germline-StructuralV-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for germline structural variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for calling germline structural variants from short-read Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) datasets. It automates the process of SV detection to ensure reproducibility and scalability.

tools.name: ACES
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for querying small sequences in large genome sets
tools.detailed_description: ACES (Analysis of Conservation and Evolutionary Selection) is a workflow designed to query small sequences across a large set of genomes. It generates BLAST results, multiple sequence alignments, graphical fragment assemblies, and phylogenetic trees.

tools.name: EasyFuse
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for fusion gene detection from RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the accurate detection of fusion genes using RNA-seq data. It streamlines the process of identifying gene fusions, which are critical in cancer genomics.

tools.name: covigator-ngs-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for processing Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data of SARS-CoV-2. It handles steps from FASTQ to normalized and annotated VCFs using tools like GATK, BCFtools, LoFreq, and iVar.

tools.name: tronflow-mutect2
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Mutect2 somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow implementation of the GATK Mutect2 somatic variant calling best practices. It provides a reproducible workflow for identifying somatic mutations in tumor-normal pairs or tumor-only samples.

tools.name: CloudNeo
tools.one_line_profile: CWL pipeline for patient-specific tumor neoantigen identification
tools.detailed_description: A Common Workflow Language (CWL) implementation of a cloud-native pipeline for identifying patient-specific tumor neoantigens. It is designed for scalability and reproducibility in immunogenomics analysis.

tools.name: nf-tenx
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized Nextflow pipelines for 10x Genomics data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of processing pipelines for 10x Genomics data, implemented in Nextflow and containerized for reproducibility. It consolidates various 10x workflows into a single repository.

tools.name: EarlGrey
tools.one_line_profile: Automated transposable element curation and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated pipeline for the curation and annotation of Transposable Elements (TEs) in eukaryotic genomes. It streamlines the identification and classification of repetitive elements.

tools.name: dv-trio

tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for calling variants in trio (father-mother-child) datasets. It utilizes DeepVariant for generating gVCFs, GATK for joint calling, and FamSeq for post-processing to eliminate Mendelian errors.

tools.name: snk
tools.one_line_profile: CLI generation tool for Snakemake workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool that automatically generates Command Line Interfaces (CLIs) for Snakemake workflows. It enhances the usability and distribution of bioinformatics pipelines by creating user-friendly entry points.

tools.name: cLoops
